184b5(mdo): bzang po pang du blangs nas langs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gis mngon du gtul nas bla na
184b6(mdo): myed pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i tshe/ sa chen po 'od sho nang tu g.yos par gyurd to// 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang sdang ba rgya chen pos gsalo bar gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten gi bar
184b7(mdo): kyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyis dang / zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar ma thu che ba'i sdang bas snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/
184b8(mdo): de sems cad gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag 'dir skyes bzhi/ shes ldan dag sems cad
184b9(mdo): gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig ces po shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mye'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar byed do//
185a1(mdo): 'da' bar byed do// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas na chu rlung ne ran 'dzana'i 'gram na byang chub kyi shing /
185a2(mdo): drung na bzhugs te/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par mye'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ dkyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad na// de la sus kyang bsod snyoms kyang ma phul gyis
185a3(mdo): ma la bdag cag der song la tshigs su bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums te brkyang ba'am/ brkyangs te bskum pa tsam
185a4(mdo): gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis kyi tshangs ris kyi 'jig rten nas mya snang bar gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar phyi nad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol
185a5(mdo): pa/ ded dpon yul las rnam par rgyal ba po// sdig pa myi mngal// bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs// rin chen chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur mchis kyis// bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du
185a6(mdo): gsol// gcig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// sdig pa myi mnga' bzhengs zhig 'jig rten gzigs// rIn chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur
185a7(mdo): mchis kyis// bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol// gcig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad da gsol pa// nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// sdig pa myi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten
185a8(mdo): gzigs// bco lnga lon pa'i dkur zla nya ba ltar/ khyod kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag lags// zhes gsol nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis de nyid du myi snang bar gyurd to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind de las
185a9(mdo): bzhengs nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' saHlad pa/ 'jig rten 'dod pa'i bde gang dang // lha yul byung bde gang yin pa// srid pa zad pa'i bde de la// bcu drug char yang myi phod do// khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te
185b1(mdo): khur bor ba ni bde ba yin// khur ni lci ba rnams bor nas// gzhan dag blang bar myi bya'o// sred pa thams cad rnam spangs shing // 'dus byas thams cad zad nas ni// dngos po thams cad yongs shes nas// slar yang
185b2(mdo): sad par myi 'ong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / sgra nyams su btar ba las skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad na/ de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo//
185b3(mdo): de'i tshe tshong pa ka kon dang bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang / lhan cig dong ba na lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / mdza' bshes su gyur
185b4(mdo): pa'i lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas na chu klung ne ran 'dza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhu gas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par
185b5(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba nyams su btang nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na// de la sus kyang bsod snyoms a yul gyis// de la tshong pa ka gon dang / bzang
185b6(mdo): po gnyis kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug nas de ni tshong pa ka kon dang / bzang po de gnyis kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar yang 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag rang gis 'di
185b7(mdo): sta ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul du gzhug pa'i phyir brtson pa bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha des shing rta dang / tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ tshong pa ga kon dang bzang po la 'di
185b8(mdo): skad ces smras so// tshong pa tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung ne ran 'dzama'i 'gras byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po oM lon par rnam par
185b9(mdo): grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba sku nyams btar ba na/ skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad de/ de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo// de la khyod kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms la phus te/ de na khyed
186a1(mdo): kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ lha de de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong pa ka gon dang bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma/
186a2(mdo): yin la chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir 'di ltar lhas kyang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms phul ba'i phyir brtson par byed do snyam nas/ nang par sngar langs te/ sbrang rtsi dang mad
186a3(mdo): gu mang du khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ko phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong pa ka kon dang bzang pos
186a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du 'dir bdag cag gis sbrang rtsi dang 'da' gu mang du btsal te/ mchis kyis// bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste 'ang
186a5(mdo): bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te bdag gi phyag gis bsod snyoms bzhes na/ dper na mu stegs can bzhin du 'gyur bas/ de ni bdag gi cha ma yan gyis
186a6(mdo): ma la bdag gi sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o snyam pa na bcom ldan 'das la lha
186a7(mdo): rnams kyis gsol pa btsun pa sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// lhung bzed du bsod snyoms pazhes lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
186a8(mdo): dgongs shing ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnaMs la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed
186a9(mdo): kyis dgos pa byung ngo // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi dgos pa byung bar rig nas/ ri brag cas zhig sa rdo ba las byas pa'i lhung bzed mye ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba gtsang ba rdzi
186b1(mdo): myi zhim pa myed pa bzhi khyerang te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po
186b2(mdo): chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi mgo ba byung ba ste bdag gis 'tshal nas ri brag can zhig la rdo ba las rdo'i lhung bzeng myi ma lags
186b3(mdo): pas bgyis pa gsal ba gtsang ba/ dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'di ma 'tshal te mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/ 'di bzhes su gsos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te
186b4(mdo): gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung gzed gcig bzhes na/ gsum gyi sems kyi dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te gnyis las ni gnyis kyi sems mye dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te gsum las nan
186b5(mdo): gcig gi sems kyi dga' bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis rgyas po chen po bzhi las lhung bzhed bzhi bzhes pa/ lhung bzed gcig tu byin kyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas// de nas bcom ldan 'das
186b6(mdo): kyis rgyal po chen po bzhis su lhung bzed pa'i bzhes te srung bzed cig tu byin kyis brlabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa gakon dang / bzang po sas srog chags rnams la pham pa'i phyir
186b7(mdo): bso snyoms bzhes so// de des bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tshong pa ka kon dang / bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' saHsa to// tshong pa dag khyed tshur// sangs rgyas sa skyabs su reng shig/ chos la skyabs su deng shig/
186b8(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la yang skyabs su deng shig// btsun pa bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos la skyabs su mchi'o// ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma 'byung
186b9(mdo): bar gyur pa'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de la yang skyabs su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ka kon dang bzang po sbyin pa de la rdzas su y-i rang bar mdzad do// gang gi don tu sbyin pa btang // de'i don tu
187a1(mdo): 'gyur ba ste// bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na/ de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin// bsod nams nas sbyor bde ba dang / bsam pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// mu rang tu zhi ba dam pa yin/ mya ngan 'das pa tog
187a2(mdo): par 'gyur// pha rol las byung gnod pa ni// lha dang bdud kyi ris dag gis// bsod nams kho na byed pa na// bar chad bya bar myi nus so// gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phyir// gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na/ sdug bsngas
187a3(mdo): tha mar byed pa dag/ rnam par mthor zhing reg par 'gyur// de nas tshong pa ga kon dang // bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
187a4(mdo): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ chu klung ne ran 'dza' na lag na ba der gshes
187a5(mdo): te/ phyin nas chu klung ne ran 'dza na'i 'gram na bzhugs te/ zhal/ zas kyi bya ba mdzad do// de na sbrang rtsa yangang rlung slong la/ 'di gu yang rlung slong bas/ des na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun kyis thebs/
187a6(mdo): so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to//
187a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta ste
187a8(mdo): dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can 'di nye bar 'ongs so snyam du dgongs nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad nas// sdig can ji srid pa'i nyan thos mkhas pa/ gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/ pha rol gyi rtsod pa
187a9(mdo): byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa/ rang gis smra ba gsal bar byed nus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'byung bar ma gyur pa dang / pa'i tshangs pa spyod pa rgya chen po'i
187b1(mdo): skye bo mang po dang / lhal dang myi'i bar la rgya cher yang dag par legs par rab tu ma bstand kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da'o// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni yongs su mya ngan las
187b2(mdo): myi 'da'o snyam du bsams nas sdug bsngal zhing yid kyi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyund kyis thebs par rig nas/ shing 'dzam bu zhes/
187b3(mdo): bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa gang yin pa de dang ha cang myi ring bzhag na a ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de/ de nas kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / ldan pa'i sa ru ra blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyinang pa dang / bcom
187b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha rnams kyi brgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bser
187b5(mdo): ma'i snyun nad kyis thebs par bdag gis 'tshal na/ shing 'jam bu zhes bgyi bas 'dzam bu kring du gdags pa gang lags pa de dang cad myi ring ba na/ a ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te/ de nas bdag gis
187b6(mdo): dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i a ru ra 'di 'tshal te mchis kyis/ de bcom ldan 'das gsol cig// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsold pa dang / bser ma dang mthun par gyur da zhing gse
187b7(mdo): ma'i snyun nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang / rlung nad mthun par gyur nas rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu bzod nas lhag par 'tsho bar gyur
187b8(mdo): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ci tsam dges kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / shing ki drung du bstend to skyil mo krung bcas nas
187b9(mdo): sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon tu phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i srin chags par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung
188a1(mdo): gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par rig nas/ gnas nas mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong / tsha ba dang / sbrang ma dang / sha sgrab dang /
188a2(mdo): rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pas sku la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lan bdun du bkris te steng du 'go yi gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go// de nas klu'i rgyal po btang
188a3(mdo): bzung gis zhag bdun gau dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags pa myed par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lus phral te/ dpung brgyan dang / na rgyan dang / 'phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / byug pa byug sa dang / bcom
188a4(mdo): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po 'di la bser bar ma gyur da tam/ tsha ba dang / sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang /
188a5(mdo): gser ma dang / gdugs dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas sku la re/ ga par ma gyurd tam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs/ su bcad de bka' saHlad pa/ bden pa'i dga' ba bde ba yin/
188a6(mdo): chos zos pa la lta ba dang // srog chags rnams la sdom pa yis / 'jig rten 'tshe ba myed pa bde// 'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba dang / 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba bde// nga 'o nga rgyal zul ba gang
188a7(mdo): de nyid bde ba dam pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das ci tsam bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / rtswa'i gdang pa bsham pa nyid la
188a8(mdo): skyes mo krung bcas/ sku drang por bsrang bltas dran pa mngon par phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs te/ skyil mo krung gcig gis bdud 'das par mdzad cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs pa
188a9(mdo): mthun pa dang / lugs dang kyi mthun pa 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad de// 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di yod 'di skyes pas 'di skyes pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa//
188b1(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyis mying dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen kyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen kyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa/
188b2(mdo): le nad pa'i rkyend kyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyend kyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyend kyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mya bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de
188b3(mdo): ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di myed na 'di myed lang/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag
188b4(mdo): 'du byed 'gags pas rnas par zhes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas kyang dang gzugs 'gas// mying dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas rig sa 'gas/
188b5(mdo): reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gaka/ tshor ba 'gags pasasred pa 'gags/ sred pa 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag/ sen dpa 'gags pas/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas// skye
188b6(mdo): pa 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngag sa 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'azhug pa rnams 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngas kyi phung po
188b7(mdo): chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas/ ting nge 'dzind de las bzhengs te/ de'i tshi tshigs su bcad de bka' stsalang ze/ kang che chos 'di
188b8(mdo): dag ni skyed byed pa'i// brtsod 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// gang me chos nasus rgyu dang bcas shes bya// de nas de'i som nyi thams cad bral// gang me chos 'di dag ni bskyed byed pa'i// brtson 'grus
188b9(mdo): ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa'i yin// gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa/ de nas de'i som nyi thams cad bral// kang tshe chos 'di dag ni bskyed byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yA
189a1(mdo): gang tshe tshor ba zad pa thob gyur pa// de nas de'i som nyi thams cad bral// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni bskyed byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// gang tshe rkyen rnams zad pa thob
189a2(mdo): nas ni// des na de'i som nyi thams cad bral// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni bskyed byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur de nas// de nas de'i som nyi thams cad
189a3(mdo): bral// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni bskyed byed pa'i// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// 'jig rten kun tu snang bar 'dug pa ni// ji ltar bar snang nyi ma shard pa bzhin// gang tshe chos 'di dag ni
189a4(mdo): bskyed byed pa'i/ brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin// bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom gnas te// sangs rgyas kun datu sbyor las rnam par grol// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
189a5(mdo): dgongs te/ bdag gis chos zab mo zab par snang ba mthong / bar dga' zhing // khong du chud par dka' ba// rtog ge ba rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa zhib mo 'dzangs pa mkhas pa
189a6(mdo): dang // rig pa'i rnam par shes par bya ba rtogs te// de bdag gis gzhan la smras kyang gzhan gyis de myi shes pas des bdag dub par 'gyur// ngal bar 'gyur// sems la spro ba myed pa kho na
189a7(mdo): bar zad pas/ ma la bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nags stug por mthong ba'i chos la// bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor da la rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam ste// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs lngas
189a8(mdo): cu dus bzhugs pa la gzugs gzhol bar mdzad cing / chos 'chad pa la ma yin no// de nas tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten 'dis rung ngo // kye ma'o 'jig rted 'dis
189a9(mdo): rung ba ste/ gang gi phyir da ltar brgya lam na lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'asangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni// dper na u dum 'ba' ra'i me tog bzhin bcom ldan
189b1(mdo): 'das de da ltar thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la/ thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing / chos 'chad pa la ma yin pas/ ma la bdag der song la de la gsol ba gdab po snyam mo// de nas tshangs pa myi mched kyi bdag
189b2(mdo): pos dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums nas brkyang ba dang / brkyang nas bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mye snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi
189b3(mdo): spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// mu ka dang ni sngod chad chos byung ba/ dag pa ma lags dri mar bcas pas rtogs// bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgo na
189b4(mdo): phye mdzod la// dri ma myed pas rtogs pa bshad par mdzod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' sa \u0f7fla da pa// tshangs pa ngas ni tshigs chen gyis// skyon rnams bcom
189b5(mdo): nas togs gyur pa// sid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis// chos 'di legs par rtogs kyi 'gyur// rgyun las zlog+sa/ phyogs 'gro ba'i lam// zab cing shinang tu mthong dka' ba/
189b6(mdo): mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa'i// 'dod chags zhen pas mthong kyi 'gyur// btsun pa 'jig rten pa tu skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la/ dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po
189b7(mdo): 'brang po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / drang sla ba dang / gdul sla ba dang / nyon mongs pa chung ba dang / rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te/ de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma zos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur lags so// /
189b8(mdo): btsun pa dper na ud pa la 'am/ pad ma 'am/ ku mu ta 'am/ pad ma dkar po dag chab nas skyes shing / chab nas chen por gyur da te/ chabs nas 'phags te Sha cag ni cha ba dang mnyam/ 'o cog ni chab kyi na
189b9(mdo): du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing / 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la yang dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po 'bri ba dang / dbang po rtul po dang / drang sra ba dang / nyon
190a1(mdo): mongs pa chung ba dang / rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te// de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bas/ chos rin po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis// bcom ldan
190a2(mdo): 'das chos bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan kyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam nas
190a3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan kyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang / 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du dka' ba
190a4(mdo): 'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po 'bring po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / drang sra ba dang / gdul sla ba dang / nyon mongs pa chung ba dang / rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod de/ de dag dam pa'i chos
190a5(mdo): ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka'
190a6(mdo): saHlad pa/ bdud rtsi'i sgo mo dag ni dpe bar byas/ nyan par su 'od da som nyi sol cig dang / tshangs po myaM rnams la ni gya dom chos// glan ka mye tshol mdo tsam bshad par bya// de nas tshangs pa myi mjed kyi
190a7(mdo): bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro// kye bde bar gshegs pas chos bstand par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/ dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya
190a8(mdo): chen po dang / yad bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mye snang bar gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
190a9(mdo): te/ ngas su la thog mar chos bshad par bya'o// snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'bur de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de ni pa'i thog ma 'i slob dpon kho na yin pazhi
190b1(mdo): du brjed pa'i/ dam pas brjed cing / mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do// rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang // yid rangs shing dad par gyur da to snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsold pa/ btsun pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu gum nas
190b2(mdo): dgung bdun lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs te/ ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sgra rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi nas zhag bdun lon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e malo sgyu
190b3(mdo): rgyal shes kyi bu ring 'phur zhi ba do ni te bor ma skyes so// e ma'o sgyu rtsa la shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi ba de ni shi na tu te por ma skyes te/ chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so// gal te 'dis chos 'dul ba 'di thos na/ shes par 'gyur ba zhen
190b4(mdo): go snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas rangs byed kyi bu lhag myong de la thog ma
190b5(mdo): chos bshad par bya ste/ de ni pa'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin pado zhen du brjed pa'i dam pas brjed cing / mchod pa'i dam pas mchod cang rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yid rangs shing dad par gyur to/
190b6(mdo): snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsolang pa btsur pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag myong ma dang gsum srong sa gum lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa la zhugs te/
190b7(mdo): shes gzigs pa bskyed nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag myong srong sa shi bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag myod shi ba de ni te por ma skyes te/ e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu
190b8(mdo): lhag myod shi ba de ni sho nad tu te por ma skyes te/ chos 'dul ba 'di ma zos so// gal te chos 'dul ba 'di zos nas shes pa myi ring bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas thog mar
190b9(mdo): su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo// de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma ya ngas sde lnga'i dge slong de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis pa sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor kyi rjes su brtson par
191a1(mdo): gnas pa na/ bla ma dang / gus pa dang / sdug pa dang bcas pas gnas pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dri snyam du dgongs te/ lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da lta gang na 'dug snyam mo// bcom

191a3(mdo): chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas ba ra na se'i ka sha'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nye 'gro lam de nyid du lam du zhugs par gyu rang to// kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas
191a4(mdo): gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsolang to// dge sbyong ko'u ta ma khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dang / bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni gsal na/ tshe dang ldan pa ke tu

194a3(mdo): sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma she na mo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang gyi

194a5(mdo): nam mkha' sa rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dang / rgyas chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum kyi lha dang / zab bral dang / dgal ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sku
194a6(mdo): rnams kyis/ skad cig dang / za cig de dang / sud tsam dedang / skad gcig dang / zad cig dang / yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten kyi bar du sgra bsgrags so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
194a7(mdo): kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed do// grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ra na ser drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa/ dge
194a8(mdo): spyod ngam/ bram ze 'am ka sgra dang / bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par 'ga' yang ma bskor ba// skye bo mang po sa phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying
194a9(mdo): brtse ba dang / lha dang / mya rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ras mngon par 'phel zhing sta oM yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis par

194b3(mdo): lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal ba kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ skye ba
194b4(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dang / rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang / na ba sdug pa sngal ba dang / 'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang / myi sdug pa dang 'phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
194b5(mdo): gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal ba dang / mdor na nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba ste/ de yod// sa su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa la lam yan lag brgyang
194b6(mdo): pa bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pabaden pa gang zhe na/ yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang / ldan pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba ste/ de spang ba'i phyir 'phag
194b7(mdo): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ yang srid pa'i sred pa'i dka' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang / de la mngon par dka' bar gang yin pa de nyid
194b8(mdo): ma lus par spangs pa dang / bor ba dang / gsal ba dang / bang pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gags pa dang / zal ba dang nub pa ste/ de mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yang lag ya rgyad
194b9(mdo): pa bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba lelam 'phags pa'i bdes pa gang zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di lta ste// yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang
195a1(mdo): dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind te/ de yang bsgom par bya'o// chos kyi rna
195a2(mdo): grangs 'di bshad pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u tin len pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de
195a3(mdo): 'tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gcig dang gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong lnga sde'i lhag ma rnams la bkalas la da pa/ dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no// dge slong
195a4(mdo): ngag gal te gzugs bdag yin na/ gzugs la gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar myi 'gyur zhing / gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur da cig/ 'di lta bur ma gyur da cig snyam na yang 'thob pa
195a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa/ de'i phyir gzugs la bdag gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/ zhing / gzugs la bdag gyis gzugs 'di lta bur gyur da cig
195a6(mdo): 'di lta bur ma gyur da cag snyam du yang 'thob par myi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no// dge slong dag gal te rnam par shes pa bdag
195a7(mdo): yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar yang myi 'gyur zhing / rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur da cig/ 'di lta bur ma gyurd cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// /
195a8(mdo): dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyu rad cig/ 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang
195a9(mdo): 'thob par myi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gas kyi rtag/ btsun pa myi rtag lags so// mye rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa sdug bsngal
195b1(mdo): b.lags so// kyigag pa sdug bsngal pa rnas par 'gyur ba'i cos pan yin 'des/ reg laphags pa'i nyan momathas pa da 'i de ma na so// ba 'i 'diyi do// dzin ba gi nga ga
195b2(mdo): sams yin / btsun pa sa lags so// dge song dag ri rnam du mams/ dang/ 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa rigs pa dazugs kyi // btsun pa gyi ga
195b3(mdo): rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nas/ sdug bsngal ma yin// btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so// myi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la jig 'phags pa nyam thos
195b4(mdo): thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go// bdag ni 'di yin no'o// 'di ni bdag gi bdag gi zhes bdag rgya'am len tam// btsun pa ma lags so// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ gzugs gang yin pa de ci yang rung ba
195b5(mdo): 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ ma 2/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa'am/ 'am/ ngad pa 'am/ phyi rom pa 'am/ gang dag pag na 'am/ gang dag pag nye

195b8(mdo): 'am/ gya rnam pa 'am/ gang dag lag ring ba 'am/ gang dag lag nye ba 'am/ de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yid/ bdag ni de ma yid/ de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no// zhes ji lnga ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i zhes
195b9(mdo): rab kyis blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos// thos pa dang ldan te nye bar len pa'i phung po 'di bdag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin par lta ste/ de de ltar ba na 'jig rten ci yang len pa myed do//
196a1(mdo): lend pa myed na yongs su gdung ba myed do// yongs su gdung ba myed na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa la ste nad to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las

196a3(mdo): ldan 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ba ra na so'i 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs te/ de'i che ba ra na sa na rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nyi ma re re zhing / bud myed kyis

196a5(mdo): par gyur to// rigs kyi rtse bo bu grag 'di la mtshan mo gnyid sad/ pa na/ bud myed de dag thams cad brdol zhing sgren mor byung la smra zhi/ lag pa brkyang ste byung rgyal bu zla ba mthong ngo // mthong ras kyang de dag
196a6(mdo): ki chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas rig kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa al chen po las babs ste/ rin po che'i tshe 'i lham brgyad stong ri bzung cig gyon nas nyal khang gi sgo gangan pa
196a7(mdo): der song ste phyi nad nas/ grogs po bdag ni gtses so// grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan pa phyung ba dang / de'i sgo mya ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang myi grags par byas so// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
196a8(mdo): grags pa khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grogs po bdag ni gtses so// grogs po bdag ni nyams so// zhes skad ngan pa phyung nas/ de'i sgo myi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas/ skad kyang kyi grag par byas so//
196a9(mdo): de nas rigs kyi gtso bo yi bu grags pa grong khyer kyi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grogs po bdag ni gtses so// grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes/ skad ngan pa phyung ba dang / de'i sgo myi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad
196b1(mdo): kyang myi grag par byas so// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab cu gnod pa can gang na ba der song na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na gtsug lag gang gi phyi rol bla gam myed pa na/ rigs

196b3(mdo): nas kyang dge slong bdag ni gtses so// dge slong bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan pa phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi rtse bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' saHyad to// gzhon nu tshur shog/ gnas 'din

196b7(mdo): dang ldan pa'i gtam kyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dka' bar mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi
196b8(mdo): gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyid pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chu ba'i panyes dbyeg dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /

197a1(mdo): sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa

197a8(mdo): gnyid log pa las sad nas/ gzhon nu grags pa mal chen po na gyi snang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khyim bdag rigs kyi rtse bo gang na ba deras song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag rigs kyi tso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to/

197b1(mdo): tu' b.ras byung kyang / nyas du sems cing rdzogs pazhir mo gagatang ba dag 'byenas/ rang nyi sa gan skrod ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan gcig sa/ 'thab cu nod pa can gangan par sogs su song ba dang / khyis bdas

197b3(mdo): ma khrid kyi 'di ltar 'bab rgya ga dong pa can gyi 'gram da/ rin po mo'i skam brgya stong ri ba zub cig phud mas sa ni/ gzhon nu 'thab chu gnod sa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid nas rgyal bar ma gyur dgrang // 'di ltapa 'bab mu gnod pa
197b4(mdo): can gyi 'gram ma/ rin po mo'i lham brgya stong ri bzung cig bor ro// snyam du bsams nas/ 'bab chu gnod pa cad kyi ngogs de nyid nas rgal tre/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste// bcom ldan 'das
197b5(mdo): kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgya po ring po nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa khyim bdag rig/ sa kyi rtse bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du kyi

198a1(mdo): mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam kyis yang dag par bstan pa la
198a2(mdo): tshogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang rgyan thams cad kyis

198a9(mdo): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs par de bzhin du gzhon nu grags pas mya slob pa'i shes pa dang / myi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags
198b1(mdo): pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so// btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na/ myi slob pa'i shes pa dang / gyi slob pa'i

198b4(mdo): khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsu bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas
198b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro/ na bza' sham thabs mnabs nas/ lhung zed dang / chos gos bsnams te/ phye bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags

198b7(mdo): sgo na sdong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir bdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//
198b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das tshur 'byor bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das ba dan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes ga/ sol nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs
198b9(mdo): so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
199a1(mdo): ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng stong// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/
199a2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing / nyes
199a3(mdo): dmyigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do// gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom
199a4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis dka' ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag yul gi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i/ sangs rgyas
199a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag phul kyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di/ lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po// sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do//
199a6(mdo): dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog myed pa'i mtshon rtsi'i 'os pI na du bcug na/ mtshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du// tshe dang ldan pa 'i bu grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin
199a7(mdo): du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos 'thob pa
199a8(mdo): dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis myi gri ba dang / stond pas bstand pa'i chos rnams la myi 'jigs pa
199a9(mdo): thob nas/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba/ de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so// bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags
199b1(mdo): lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon
199b2(mdo): par dad lags so// btsun pa de'i slad du/ 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan
199b3(mdo): bgrags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bas kanang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang / gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi las
199b4(mdo): nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ nam grangs du mar gtsang zhing / gsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stabs shing tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs
199b5(mdo): telhung zed rgyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig blangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir nye 'od do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang
199b6(mdo): chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par stonayang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug par mdzad de/ yang dag par gzer bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/
199b7(mdo): rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug// yang dag par gzer bstod// yang dag par rab tu dka' bar mdzad nas ba dan las bzhengs te/ gshegs
199b8(mdo): so// ba ra na sen khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri myed pa lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i zhu
199b9(mdo): grags pa skra dpal su bregs te// kos ngur smyig gyod nas// dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung po zhes thos so// zos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni
200a1(mdo): mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstand pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re shig shi na tu gzhon pa/ shi nad tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha
200a2(mdo): bregs te/ kos ngur smyig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung gis/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang skra dang kha su bregs te/ gos ngur smyig bgos nas dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
200a3(mdo): myed par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga gang po dang / dri myed dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs dang / rigs kyi gtso bo ru
200a4(mdo): rnams ba ra na se nas byung nas// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'ge bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
200a5(mdo): gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / te gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri myed dang / ba yang bdag dang / sag bzangs ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo bu rnas
200a6(mdo): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// btsur ba legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu byung ba dang bsnyed par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos por gnang na bdag
200a7(mdo): cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par gyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por thob
200a8(mdo): ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nasatshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/ brtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas so// gcig pu dben pa ga yod pa/ brtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid
200a9(mdo): gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha su bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par myed pa'i mtha' bla na myed pa che 'di
200b1(mdo): nyid la rang gyi mngon par shes pas mngon gsum du byas te/ bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa la brten do// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan myi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /
200b2(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// ba ra na/
200b3(mdo): se na grong myi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus/ rigs kyi rtse bo'i bu gang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste/ grags pa'i dang / kang po dang / dri myed dang / ba yang bdag dang /
200b4(mdo): lam bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams sgra dang la su zags te/ gos ngur smyig bgos nas/ ngad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung po zhes thos so// thos nas kyang
200b5(mdo): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bstand pa yang mchog ma yin pa/ ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bug papo
200b6(mdo): dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa/ grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri myed dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag ngas ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re shig shi nad tu gzhon
200b7(mdo): pa/ shi nang tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha u bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung gyis ma la bdag cag kyang sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos
200b8(mdo): dur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ngo snyam mo// de nas grong khyer gi gtso ga rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag par da se nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kang na pa
200b9(mdo): der song ste sbags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang myi'i gtso ba'igatso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po 'di dag gyis bcom ldan
201a1(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan
201a2(mdo): 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par myod pa pyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe
201a3(mdo): dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas so// gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir 'gis
201a4(mdo): kyi bu dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to// de'i tshe na 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug bcu dang / drug bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das
201a5(mdo): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa ra na se'i drang srong smra ba'i ri/ dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' saHlad pa/ dge slong dag pa ni lha dang
201a6(mdo): myi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang myi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan
201a7(mdo): pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang myi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing depal / khyed gnyis shing ni gcig tu ma 'gro shig/ da yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang
201a8(mdo): na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems tedage sbyong go 'u ta ma 'di ba ra na se'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos stond to// dge
201a9(mdo): slong dag nga ni lha dang myi dang 'ching ba gang yin pa de/ thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang myi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes
201b1(mdo): bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/ ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// /
201b2(mdo): de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byang du bdag nyid mngon par skul te/ bcom ldan 'das gapar ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/
201b3(mdo): ma grol grol bar 'du shes na// ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems// bdag gis dge sbyong ma grol bas// 'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te// me ma'o
201b4(mdo): 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te// 'di lta ste dkrug pa'i phyogs kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' saHlad pa/ da ni lha dang myi rnams kyi// 'ching ba gang yin kun
201b5(mdo): las grol// bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par// sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/ de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du ses te/ dge sbyong ko'u ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig
201b6(mdo): nas// sdug bsngal zhing yid kyi bde la yid la bcag nas de nyid du rtse snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' saHlad pa/ dge slong
201b7(mdo): dag nga ni lha dang myi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang myi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis dge sbyong dag skye bo mang po la phan
201b8(mdo): ba dang / zhes bya ba las rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin no// pa yang lteng rgyas kyi klong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
201b9(mdo): las mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kha ra na ser ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ steng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs
202a1(mdo): pa dang / grong khyer sde can du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bas can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing cig gi drung du bsten te/ nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so//
202a2(mdo): de'i tshe drug sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol na nyi ma re re zhing bud myed kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ de rnams las bud myed gcig dam
202a3(mdo): bcas pa dral te bros so// de nas drug sde bzang po'i tshogs bud myed de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshang tshing kang na ba der dong ba dang / drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dad par
202a4(mdo): 'os wa/ dbang po zhi ba zugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na brten te bzhugs
202a5(mdo): pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ka bud myed cig gzigs so// gzhon nu dag bud myed de khyed cag gi cir 'ong // btsun pa 'di
202a6(mdo): na bdag cag drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol du bud myed kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/ dga' par bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams dang brda/
202a7(mdo): cag rtse bar bgyidadaga' bar bgyidag dgal mgur gyod par bgyid pa na/ bud myed gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshos lags so// gzhon nu dag ji snyam du sems/ bud myed tshol ba gang yin pa
202a8(mdo): dang / bdag nyid tshol ba yin pa de gang gdam/ btsun pa bdag cag bud myed kyis ci bgyid bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lags so// gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang / khyed la chos
202a9(mdo): bshad do// de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug bcu sdel
202b1(mdo): babang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtas gyis yang dag par bstan pa las stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/
202b2(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon pa rtogs so// de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som
202b3(mdo): las rgal ba dang / the tsom las gas pa dang / gzhan gyi drid kyi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis kyi dkri ba dang / ston pas bstand pa'i chos rnams la gyi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ tha gos zag pa gcig
202b4(mdo): sa gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kang na pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolar to// btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so//
202b5(mdo): bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// deng slan cad ci srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos
202b6(mdo): skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so// de nas rlugabacu sde bzang po ya pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHsang pa la ma par dka' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
202b7(mdo): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas// snga dron bza' sham thabs mnabs nas/ lhung zed dang chos kos bsnams te grong
202b8(mdo): khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ mA la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mar su la chos bshad snyam pa las/
202b9(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dka' mo dang / dka' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor da la rjes su brtson pas
203a1(mdo): gnas pa na 'dis mar sar dang / 'o zug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dka' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so//
203a2(mdo): grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du bdan bshams kyang 'di skad ces kyang gsold to// bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon
203a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so// de nas grong pa'i bu mo dang dga' stobs
203a4(mdo): mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma ya chos dang ldan pa la gtam
203a5(mdo): gyis yang dag par bstand ces bya ba nas mngon par dad nas skabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
203a6(mdo): skad ces gso la da to// btsun pa de'i tshe la slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'dra kyi grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo //
203a7(mdo): de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dkal stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi
203a8(mdo): lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te/ phyag bcabs
203a9(mdo): shing lhung zed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig bshams te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dka' mo dang / dka' stobs ma la
203b1(mdo): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa/ yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ ba dan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan
203b2(mdo): 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas yul ma ka ta 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na/ de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung ngus skye rje
203b3(mdo): 'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba/ su zhig yod snyam mo// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcas nas/ lo brgya nyi shu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga pa'i myi rnams kyis bkur bsti bya ba
203b4(mdo): dpa / bla mar bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing / 'khor lnga brgya dang ra ran 'dza' mo'i klung nga gi 'gram gi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// de nas bcom
203b5(mdo): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu son pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ka ta'i myi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub myong
203b6(mdo): ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa cad dbang du byas te/ 'di dbang du gyur na/ tshegs chu dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan
203b7(mdo): 'das steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang da ba der gshegs so// steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du ba dan bshams
203b8(mdo): nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// dge slong chen po khyod pa legs so// dge sbyong chen po yun ring mo zhig lags na gang nas 'khor te 'dir dpyod// dge sbyong chen po bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol
203b9(mdo): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon tu yang dag par dga' ba dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar/
204a1(mdo): 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' saHyang to//
204a2(mdo): srung gal te khyod la myi bde ba myed na/ khyod kyis mye khang du ngazhag cig 'dug go// dge slong chen po bdag la myi bde ba mchis na/ 'on kyang de na kla gdug pa zhig gnas te/ des khyod mtho brtsams par 'gyur du mtsha'o
204a3(mdo): 'od srung khyod kyis re shig gnang bar gyis shig/ dang 'tho brtsams par myi 'gyur ro// dge sbyong chen pos gal te khyod la 'tho mya 'tsham na/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde bar bzhugs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung /
204a4(mdo): ral pa can gyi mye 'ang ga na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ mye gang gyi phyi rold tu zhabs bsil nas/ mye gang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid dkyis rtsa'i gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ skyil mo kru
204a5(mdo): bcas dran pa mngon tu phyogs par bzhag ste/ bzhugs so// klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthonganas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
204a6(mdo): kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo // klu gdug pas khros pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mye'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas klu gdug pa 'khros pa'i mthu
204a7(mdo): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus mye khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ mye lce gcig tu gyur bas sreg par byed do// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la sta ba na/
204a8(mdo): mye 'ang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// mye khang gcig tu gyur da nas sreg par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma 'di ltar mdzes pa/ klu gdug pas thal bA
204a9(mdo): byas par ma gyur nga grang / kye hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshag ma mnyan to snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas chas bcad kyis/ ma la ngas rdzu
204b1(mdo): 'phrul de lta bur mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag pa na skyes klu gdug pa'i kye zil kyis mnas la res kyang de'i lus la gnod par myi byed par byas nas lhung zed kyi dang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
204b2(mdo): can de la sbyan pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa thugs mnyam par bzhag na myes klu gdug pa'i myo zil gyis mAnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa kyi
204b3(mdo): byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de// de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung zed du bcud de/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der snoms te gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong
204b4(mdo): // mabong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig/ 'od srung gson no// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi srung zed na bsdoms te byon pa ci/ 'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus/
204b5(mdo): khyod kyi mye gang du gyur gyur da pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa gnas su myi ste/ ra ga de ngas btul nas lhung zed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so// de nas steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
204b6(mdo): ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshache mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas baHma ldan 'das steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can kyi bste gnas kyi
204b7(mdo): dgas tshapo chi na bzhugs so// de'i tshe steng rgyas 'od srung ngas pa can gi bste gnas na bram bu'i khye'u lnga brgyarnam gyi la yongs su myong ba'i re'i rtse la bas gsum gsum ste skyel ba stong lnga brgya song ngo // de rus rnam
204b8(mdo): ze'i khye'u de rnams la yongs su pyod par 'dod na/ kye sbyar bar ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i the'u de rnams steng nas 'od srung dus pa can gang da ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng rgyas 'od srung ras pa can la 'di skad
204b9(mdo): ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyend par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad par 'tshal na zhugs de sbar bar rngo ma thog lags de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong
205a1(mdo): chen po bdag gi nyen 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ras pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
205a2(mdo): gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzod cing / 'dir bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam mye la yongs su gyod par 'tshal na/ mye de sbar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nyen pa 'khor
205a3(mdo): na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid de/ 'od srung mye sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po sbar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i
205a4(mdo): mthus mye de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rald pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag nyid kyang dgra
205a5(mdo): bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams mye/ la yongs su spyad nas mye gsod par 'dod na gsad par ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa ca
205a6(mdo): gang na ba der song ste lpags nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa cad la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyend par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su pyad nas zhugs dgum par
205a7(mdo): 'tshal na/ dgum pa'i rngo ma thog lags so// de nas steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nyen 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od
205a8(mdo): sru ras pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyir nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la
205a9(mdo): yongs su pyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na// dgum pa'i rngo ma thog lags/ bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nyen 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do// 'od
205b1(mdo): srung rtse re bsad dam/ dge sbyong chen po dkum du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/
205b2(mdo): 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongasu spyod par 'dod
205b3(mdo): na spyar ma nus so zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du kor ma bzhin no// de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas bsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar
205b4(mdo): cu gong ma bzhin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na steng rgyas 'od srung rul pa can gi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sred par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
205b5(mdo): pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsang par ma nus so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi
205b6(mdo): nyer 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur dgrang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom lda na 'das ka ngan ba der song ste phyi ning nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
205b7(mdo): skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol// dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi me 'ang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid
205b8(mdo): pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po bsgrims nas zhugs kum pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nyen 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhig
205b9(mdo): byung bar ma gyur nga kra bsnyam bgyid do// 'od srung me te shi bar bya 'am/ dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i me thus me zhang de rang nyid
206a1(mdo): // bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po sgyu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom
206a2(mdo): ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can ki sti gnas nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas/ mtshan mo la bab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kar na ba de mdong ste lhags nas
206a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag byas te/ de nas dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/
206a4(mdo): dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kund tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur da nas sreg par byed pa yod do snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od blo srung ral pa can
206a5(mdo): nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas byin da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge skye/ pa chen po mnyend par mdzad du gsol 'dir mdang gsum rgya skar nas
206a6(mdo): la lta ba na/ dge slong chen po'i spyan snga na/ shugs kyi phung po 'bar ra dbu 'bar/ kun da tu rab tu 'bar te/ me sde gcig tu gyur nas meg pa byed pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge
206a7(mdo): skyong chen po yang kyi la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyad lda nam me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me rtse gcig tu gyur dpas meg par byed pa bzhi sa yong mchis po snyam so// 'od srung si ma sa so
206a8(mdo): spyong dang // bame la yongs su kyi spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nam nyon mongs las// sems da yongs su zlog byed pa// me 'am yang na myangs la// yongs paste nga yon tan ci zhig yod// de sa yod kyi 'dir ma dang gsum rgyal po che / ba
206a9(mdo): bzhi po dga' dog 'phags pas/ mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bkang na ba der 'ongs te sngags nas/ nga'i zha'as gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas te/ de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun datur 'atu 'bar te/ me rje
206b1(mdo): gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag
206b2(mdo): kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder po ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na/
206b3(mdo): me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyurang pa bzhi po de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches ldag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// lte ba rgyas 'od srung
206b4(mdo): ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgya skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan la dngas kyi spyan sngar me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya nas/ dge sbyong chen po chu da 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang ngaH
206b5(mdo): bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bam du gong ba bzhin no// de nas myi mjed gi bdag po dgongs pa 'dog 'phags pas mtshan mo da pan/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyinang nas/ bcom
206b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa byas bya ba nas/ me'i phung po lnga po de mye lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do// zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas
206b7(mdo): kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la/ ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i/
206b8(mdo): phung po 'bar shes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mong gi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no/ snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
206b9(mdo): can gi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma ga da'i myi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar
207a1(mdo): shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis
207a2(mdo): lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gi sems mkhyend nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do// de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byed pa byung ngo // bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan pa/
207a3(mdo): skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang / 'di snyam du sems te/ zhag bdun po 'di la
207a4(mdo): bdag rnyed pa dang bkur bsti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang bca' bar dab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyurang kyis/ kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis
207a5(mdo): de yang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug ko snyam mo// de nas btso/ ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gi sems mkhyen nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs/
207a6(mdo): steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso lang ngo to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so//
207a7(mdo): dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di 'das na gzhan du bzhud lags// 'od srung phyong gi 'dug gnas na bachod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas/ 'di snyam du gal te ma ga da'i myi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen
207a8(mdo): bo ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'dinas
207a9(mdo): gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo // 'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin
207b1(mdo): zhag bdun du byas zinang nas 'di snyam tu bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbadud gyurang gis/ kyes dge slong chen
207b2(mdo): po 'ongs kyang cim rung / bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam// dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong
207b3(mdo): chen po'i bde kho nar longs spyod du gsol// de nas lteng chus 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam tu sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul me zhing mthu me ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mong gi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no//
207b4(mdo): snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ma can gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdang / kri nyin 'khor du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun
207b5(mdo): pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ralapa can la cang kyi gsung bas gnang ngo / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral/ pa can gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang 'o nas g.yos byas nas
207b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdug mchod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gso
207b7(mdo): 'od srung de'i phyir song shig pa yang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyend nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag nas/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba kar gyis 'dzam bu
207b8(mdo): gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / tri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i sdo ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ lte brgyas 'od srung ral pa can ki bsti gnas ka pan ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind
207b9(mdo): la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas ba dan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rdo'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung yas ya 'os das bsti gnas kyi bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nA
208a1(mdo): kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byo nang dam/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi ljang zed na ci mchis 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyend nas ji ltar zhugs mnyam par bzhag na
208a2(mdo): shing 'dzam bu'i zhes pa gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / tri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung zed bkang nas 'dir phyind pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs kyis/ gal te
208a3(mdo): 'dod ma longs spyod cing / dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan chen mod kyi bdag kyang
208a4(mdo): dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling d+ya gdags pa de dang ha cang myi ring ba zhig na a r+ya ra'i nag/ sa dang / byil ba'i nags dang / ka bying ta'i nags dang / skyu ru ra'i nags/
208a5(mdo): kyang de bzhin no// byang ki sgra gyi snyan ki gling du gshegs nas ma chos ma btab po'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams/ nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can ki sti gnas gang na ba der gshes
208a6(mdo): te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsti gnas kyi bdan bshams pa nyid
208a7(mdo): la bzhugs mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung zed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyend nas
208a8(mdo): ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ byang gi sgra myi snya nang gi glong du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras lhung zed bkang nas/ 'dir phyind pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs kyis
208a9(mdo): kal te 'dod na longs spyod cig// dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/
208b1(mdo): ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do//
208b2(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgongs pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyinang nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
208b3(mdo): kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la snun pa dang / de nas bkod pa chen po zhig byung ste/ chubab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod pa chen po byung ste/
208b4(mdo): chu 'bab pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni myed na chu 'di da ltar kang nas bab snyam mo// de ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das ka na ba der song ste
208b5(mdo): phyi nad nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge spyod chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na/ bkod pa chen po'i che ba gcig mthong ngo // mthong
208b6(mdo): nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na/ da ltar mya 'di kang nas bab snyam bgyid do// 'od srung khyod 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyo
208b7(mdo): ba mdzad pa na/ dra chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gis pa la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar gshegs nas/ ra kang na ba der 'ongs te phyi nad nas/ nga'i mdun du lag pa sa la bstun pa las/
208b8(mdo): de nas bkod pa chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i dgos pa mdzad de/ 'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul/
208b9(mdo): me zhing ma thu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan me mong gi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phreng yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ jiphel ga pas brkos pa gangan ba de gshegs te byod nas/
209a1(mdo): rdzi lag pas brkos pa'i 'akram gi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzide lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku zhus mdzad nas// rdzing lag pas bskos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing a
209a2(mdo): rdzu na kang na ba der logs su phyag brkyang ngo // de nas a rdzu na'i yal ka chen po rgud par gyur da te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bcung nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag
209a3(mdo): ba ra rdzib lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na/ a rtsu na'i yal ka chen po rud pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam buse mas te/ a rdzu na'i yal ka 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyurd na/ a r+dz+dza na'i yal ga chen po 'di de su zhig
209a4(mdo): gis prat+yad snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das kang na der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ dge sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol//
209a5(mdo): bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos po'i 'gram na// a r+dz+dza na'i yal ka chen po tud pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ a rdzu na'i yal ka chen po 'di
209a6(mdo): sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/ dmu zhig kyis btud snyam bgyid do// 'od srung 'dir phyi 'phred nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing la ga pas brkos pa kang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag brkos
209a7(mdo): pa'i 'gram gi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te/ lus zhus byas nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing a rdzu na 'di dka kang ba der logs su laka pa
209a8(mdo): brkyang ba dang / de nas a m+bu na'i yal ka chen po 'di dud par gyur te/ de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag pas rkos pa nas byung ngo // 'od srung 'di ni ma b+hu na'i lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
209a9(mdo): snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin gi/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod po'i sha na'i res dag brnyes nas/
209b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ki sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag gcig las rdo leb ka la
209b2(mdo): ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka na ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// bcom ldan 'das phyag darang khrod pa'i sha na'i ras ngag 'di la bskur bar gsol/ de la bcom
