209b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams kang bya bkram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi
209b4(mdo): sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig la das rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang ba na ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i
209b5(mdo): ras rnams dkram du gsol / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo //
209b6(mdo): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che ba ring ba 'di dag sngon ni myed na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das
209b7(mdo): gang na ba der song ste phyin de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo le ba che ri ba ba dag gcig mthong ngo // mthong nas/
209b8(mdo): kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig kyis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid ngo do// 'od srung 'di ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dka brnyes
209b9(mdo): so// de nas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag kang d+ha dkru snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gis sems kyis ra'i dgongs pa shes nas brag gcig la rdo leb che la ring bzhig/
210a1(mdo): blangs te/ ngagangan pa der 'ongs te phyi nang nas pal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i shA na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol// ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i shan lings nas
210a2(mdo): za bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ras phyag dang khrod pa'i ras rnams gang d+ha bkras snyam pa dang / de nas lhurnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ zag gcig las ro leb chel ring ba zhig
210a3(mdo): blangs te/ dkang na ba der 'ongs te phyi nad nas ngal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dkram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dkram mo//
210a4(mdo): 'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gis blangs pazhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sem nas te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/
210a5(mdo): ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can ki bsti gnas gi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ne ran 'dza' na'i chu rar
210a6(mdo): 'brug nas bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung myi gang bas ldag par khyebs pa'i steng na rdul gis yog pa bla ka ba myed pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du seMs
210a7(mdo): te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po drug pas khyer bar ma gyur da grang // ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams nas/ shing gcig pa'i mu'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba
210a8(mdo): na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gis bcom ldan 'das chu klung myi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng na/ sa rdul kis yog pa bla gab myed pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la
210a9(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol da to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'on srung gson no// dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing / gcig pa'i klur 'jug kam/ 'od srung 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ma
210b1(mdo): sa ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par banag na zhing gcig pa'i bu ris bcul 'jug pa de sa bu'i chu 'phrul ngon par 'du bya ba 'dra bya'o smras nas/ de nas yos 'das kyis ji kar thugs mnyam par banagan shing gcig pa'i klu 'i sur rgyal 'dug pa de//
210b2(mdo): rgya thus ngon par 'dus do// de snyed rgyam 'od grangs paban 'dis pa sem sa te/ 'dage slong chen po u nga pate/ macan mang kyi du kya sa bcom pa yin rnam sa// des
210b3(mdo): sem ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis steng rgyal 'od zung mas pacan gi sems sa byed dadang / skyeng rgyas 'od srubangs 'acan la 'di skad ces bka' bral to// 'od srung byod da gram ma ma yin/ dam mam pa'i 'bras bu mtshan
210b4(mdo): gsum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang myi zhes so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems tre/ dge sbyong chen po ko'u ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen
210b5(mdo): to snya ma cu rigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/ to// dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul/ pa la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
210b6(mdo): 'thob pa lta na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyad sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bkye'o// 'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srung de'i phyir re shig
210b7(mdo): 'khor la ltos cig/ 'dir khyod lta bu'i myi grags pa dang ldan pa shes ldan rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gdus na pa der song ste phyi nad nas/ bram ze
210b8(mdo): yi khye'u rnams la spras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gas shig/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis chung zad mi 'tshal
210b9(mdo): ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lag pas gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs spyod pa spyad pa na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis de'i phyir
211a1(mdo): ga yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / khar ba dang / ril ba spyi'u lugs dang / glugs gzar rnams chu klung ne ran 'dza na'i 'gram tu bor nas/ mkhan po bka' bzhin mtshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang
211a2(mdo): gzhi dang / shing shun dang / khar ba dang / ril ba spyi'u lugs dang / krugs gzar rnams chu klung ne ran 'dzana'i 'gram du bor nas// lteng rgyas 'od sru pa ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyind nas/ steng rgyas 'od sru ral pa
211a3(mdo): can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po 'dir bdag 'di ltar bdag gis bdag cag gi bkyi bka pa lags pa de bgyis lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
211a4(mdo): song ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la ltas lags te/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i 'dul chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen
211a5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag dge/ skyong chen po spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srung tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig// de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan
211a6(mdo): pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyurd to// de'i tshe lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gi spu chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis
211a7(mdo): brgya lnga bcu dang / chu klung ne ran 'dza na'i 'jug gi 'jam ki bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung spun gis g.yang bzhi dang / shi shun dang / kha ra ba dang / ril ba spyi'u lukas dang /
211a8(mdo): spug gzar de dag tu klung ne ran 'dzan nas khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams/ rgyal po 'am/ chom rkun nam/ me 'am chus nyes dmyig
211a9(mdo): 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur da grang / ma la bdag cag kyis tshangs par mtshungs pa spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung spun dag steng rgyas 'od srung spun pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od
211b1(mdo): srung ral pa can ki bsti gnas kang na ba der dong pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can swA phyi sngam sbyar dgongs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// chu klung
211b2(mdo): 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung gis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa sgra phyi snam sbyar dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan po'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la
211b3(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// 'od srung 'di mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung 'di dag mi mchog yin te de ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bco
211b4(mdo): ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang ki phyir da ltar lte nga rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'bogs gtugs pa
211b5(mdo): ma ga da'i myi rnams kyis bkur bstir byas bla mar byas brjed par/ byas// mchod pa byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan/ gnyis kyi bar dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs
211b6(mdo): kyis ya la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs
211b7(mdo): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa blta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong
211b8(mdo): chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la bltos shig// 'di 'di ltar khyed lta bu'i myi grags pa dang ldan pa/ shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung
211b9(mdo): dang / ga ya 'od srung spun rang gi bsti gnas ka na ba der dong ste phyind nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dka shes par kis shig/ kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po spyan sngar tshangs par spang
212a1(mdo): pa spyod na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang
212a2(mdo): mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus nga yin par shes par kis shika// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das
212a3(mdo): gang na ba der dong ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa mchos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
212a4(mdo): bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag dge spyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srung dag tshur sheg tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de nas
212a5(mdo): rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur da pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can/ stong po do rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ lteng rgyas
212a6(mdo): su tsi tsam bzhed ki bar du bzhugs nas/ ka ya kang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ka yar byond nas/ ka ya'i mgo mchod rten la sngon ki ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i
212a7(mdo): dge slong stong dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi su dge slong stong po de la/ cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum kis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul ki cho 'phrul dang kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / sa ma
212a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul ki cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag nyid kyis bdan gi nang bya myi snang bar gyur pa cing / shar phyog+sakarti gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod
212a9(mdo): lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de// 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad pa dang / mye'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par zhugs
212b1(mdo): pan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od gzer nam pa sna tshogs dag 'byidang par mdzad ngo do// 'di sa ste/ sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb zhan dang / shel gi kha dog go// mo 'phrul thun
212b2(mdo): du yang bskond par mdzang de/ sku'i spang nas 'bar bar ma'ang la/ sku'i stod las ni mu grang mo'i rgyus 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i stong las 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i spad nas chum mo'i rgyar 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting /
212b3(mdo): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / bya ba rnams su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhi ducu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
212b4(mdo): pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ki ku pa la bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/
212b5(mdo): dge sbyong dag byed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyed gi yid ni 'di lta/ bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni rtogs shig/ 'dre// ni ma rtogs shig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 'di ni yid la ma byed
212b6(mdo): cig/ 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma spong shig/ 'di ni lus mngon gsum du byas la rdzogs par bgyis te mnos shig/ 'di ni bcom lnga na 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das
212b7(mdo): kyi rjes su bskrun pa'i tshe 'phrul mi 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag myig dang / gzugs dang / myig gi rnam par shes/
212b8(mdo): pa dang / rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am// sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa byung ba kang
212b9(mdo): yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid gi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / yid kyi
213a1(mdo): // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis rang gi tshor ba bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// gang gis kun tu 'a
213a2(mdo): ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti muka gi mes kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
213a3(mdo): ste/ sdug bsngal gis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// chos kyi nam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can tu gyur pa'i dge slong
213a4(mdo): ki dge ba myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das g.yo'i mgo'i mchod rten la/ sngon thams cad ral pa can gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa
213a5(mdo): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phur bor ba/ bdag gi don rje/ sa su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang / dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bag stag dang zab
213a6(mdo): gcig tu bzhugs// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i myi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shaka kya rnams kyi kazho nu kangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang /
213a7(mdo): ha cang myi ring ba zhig tu/ byung ba de bram ze'i mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim par gyur da te/ khyim na gnas na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam pa rgyal ba rin
213a8(mdo): po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud myed rin
213a9(mdo): po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / brgyan po blon po rin po che yin no// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog ki gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gi sde rab tu 'jom
213b1(mdo): pa// de rgya mtsho la zhugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sngo ba myed cing 'tshe ba myed pa 'di nyid chad pa myed cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba myed la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste/ gnas par gyur to//
213b2(mdo): ka la te sgra dpa' spu bregs te gos ngur smyig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas/ khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung bar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rtenang du smran
213b3(mdo): par grags par 'gyur bar lung bsta nad to zhes zos so// thos nas kyang ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ ma ka da'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad smras so// lnga mkhyend
213b4(mdo): par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shaka/ kye'i rnams kyi gzho nu kangs ri'i ngos shes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gtse/ dkas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
213b5(mdo): dutu smra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstand pa zhig thos so// zhes bya ba'i bar du kong ma bzhin du'o// lha re zhum shig/ lha bas/ gtso bo bas ces gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// grong pa dag shag kya rnaMs
213b6(mdo): kyi gzho nu kangs rili ngos zhes bya ba nas grags par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin te/ lha de zhum shig/ lhubs gtso bo bso ches gtso bor 'gyur du 'chi'o zhes byed cag de skad ma smra zhig/ de ci'i
213b7(mdo): phyir zhe na/ grong pa dag shag kya rnams kyi gzho nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar d+ya gong ma bzhin te/ gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/ de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te skra dpal spu bregs te/ kos ngur smrig
213b8(mdo): bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung bar gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur da na/ de'i nyan
213b9(mdo): zos su khas blang bar bya'o// de nas ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi zhang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smond pa bzhi la smond par byed de/ kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gi stond pa
214a1(mdo): // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi/
214a2(mdo): bstond pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na/ des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bzad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos
214a3(mdo): shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te/ gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal da pa/ dge slong dka ma ka nga'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzun
214a4(mdo): can snying po de steng gi khar bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa bzhi lnga smond par byed de/ kye ma'o/ bdag gi yul du 'jig rten rten gi smond pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
214a5(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i khar kong ma bzhin no// ma ga/ de'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag tsa/ ka ljongs rgyu ba na/ sha ka kya rnams kyi gzhon nu kangs ri'i ros
214a6(mdo): chu bo'i skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang / ha cang yang gyi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan ma 'an dang ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags
214a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstand pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de sma dpal spu bregs te/ kos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla ma myed pa yang dag
214a8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag ka ya na ka ya'i 'go'i mchod rten la smon thams cad ral pa can gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa
214a9(mdo): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bad gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang / thabs gcig
214b1(mdo): tu bzhugs so zhes zos so// zos nas kyang ma ka da'i rgyal po pa'o sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste ljags nas/ ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyedang /
214b2(mdo): par mdzad du gsol // bdag cag 'di ni lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shag kya rnams kyi gzho nu kang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin te// de sgra dpa'
214b3(mdo): spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag ka ya na ga
214b4(mdo): a'i mi go'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'idage slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba sha stag
214b5(mdo): dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// zhes bya bar du ste/ lha de la bkur bsti mdzod cig dang de lta na lnga gtso bo bas/ chesagatso bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma ka de'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
214b6(mdo): gzugs can snying pos myi zhig la bsgo ba/ lAkye nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das ka na ba der song ste phyi nad nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag
214b7(mdo): byas la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam pa ba chung ngam/ 'tsho 'am spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan pa dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam/ zhes zhus la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol da cig/ bcom
214b8(mdo): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dngapa gzims cha dang bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen smad dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom
214b9(mdo): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kyi des ma ga da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de song ste
215a1(mdo): phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myi des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma
215a2(mdo): ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam nyam pab chung ngam zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste/ bsnyun gsol lags so// kye myi khyod dang ma
215a3(mdo): ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur da cig/ btsun pa ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas// 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/
215a4(mdo): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod noms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkye nad smand dang / yo byad rnams kyi bste/ nu bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du gshegs su
215a5(mdo): gsol zhes 'chi legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo / de nas myi des bcom ldan 'das cad myika/ srung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kauny+dza
215a6(mdo): la 'go bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyurapa pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/
215a7(mdo): zag pa zad pa/ zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shi na tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i khar sha stag dang thabs gcig tu ma ka da'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ka da' pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par
215a8(mdo): rab gnas ltang braka ki tshal yod pa kar na ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas ma ka dpa rnams kyi mchod rtend legs par rab gnas ltang brag gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so//
215a9(mdo): ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong ki dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste// /
215b1(mdo): ma ga da'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ma ka da'i pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltar brag gi tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ ma ka da pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brag gi tshal na yod
215b2(mdo): pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po nang du zhugs te rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor da pa chen pos rta dang shing rta brgya stong rnyed dang / lhan cig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / rgyal po'i
215b3(mdo): khab nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to// des bsams pa bdag gis las
215b4(mdo): skyon can cung zad cig/ byas par ma gyur da kra snyam mo// lhan sa kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las spyod can ma byas mod kyi/ khyod dang lhag gcig las 'tshungs par spyad pa gang yin
215b5(mdo): pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gis de dag zon cig// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams la// don tu bcug go// yang rgyal po phyir byung bar bsams pa na/ de'i
215b6(mdo): dbu rgyan sgo la thug go// des yang bsams pa/ bdag gis ni gdon gyi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/ des na bdag la bltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// lha de rnams
215b7(mdo): kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs pa spyad pa gam yin pa de dag 'a cig ni 'dus la gcig ni ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na/ las kyi ma
215b8(mdo): byed cing 'dug pa de dag smon cig// rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug go// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang / zhab 'bring ba rta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang /
215b9(mdo): ma ga da'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig/ rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // de ji tsam gzhon
216a1(mdo): pa'i sa'i bar du gzhon pas stong ste gzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' bar zhugs so// ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos zag ci tsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de
216a2(mdo): nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang / gzugs dang / ral gri dang / nor bu rnga yab dang ldam khra bo rnams phud do// de nas ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas/ bcom ldan
216a3(mdo): 'das kang na ba der song ste phyind pa dang / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kang na pa der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de rang gi mying nas phyung ste lan gsum du gsol cing / btsun pa bdag ni ma ka
216a4(mdo): da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// btsun pa ba drag ni ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// rgyal po legs so// rgyal po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po khyod ma
216a5(mdo): ga da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no// rgyal po/ chen po chen po ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yi/ na no rgyal po yin no rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig/
216a6(mdo): de nas ma ga da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom lda na 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// ma ka da'i bram ze dang khyim bdag la kacaka ni bcom ldan
216a7(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ kha gcig ni bcom ldan 'das dang ldan gcig mngon tu yang dag par dka' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyog
216a8(mdo): gcig tu 'khod do// kha gcig ni bcom ldan 'das gang ba na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha gcig kyis ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mye sba bar phyogs cig
216a9(mdo): tu 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur nga ngo to// ma ka ra'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas
216b1(mdo): 'od srung ras pa can gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyod dam/ 'on te lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ka da'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems
216b2(mdo): mkhyend nas/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa// lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir mi mthong na/ me spangs nas ni rtul zhugs 'di dag spyod// khyod kyis ji ltar me'i mchod spangs pa/
216b3(mdo): don de 'od srung ba la smra bar gis/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsolang pa// 'di ma kha cig zas skom de bzhin no// 'dod pa dag dang / bud myed kho na swa// de dag phung po'i dri mar rab mthong ste// des bdag mchod sbyin myi dag
216b4(mdo): sreg lus 'byidad// khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang / de bzhin ro la yi na gyi dka' da// lha myi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyiyid// dka' ba yin nas 'od srung tri mos spros// phung po ma mchis
216b5(mdo): zhi ba ci ma mchis 'dod srid ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gis kyi bkri'i ko 'phang mchog mthong ste// des bdag/ mchod sbyin myi dka' sreg klugs myin// ko 'phang myi nyams mchog
216b6(mdo): ni ma mthong bas// gnod sbyin gtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis / grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs 'gyur ro// chu long gyurang nas skye shi'i rjes bzhin mthong // skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs
216b7(mdo): bshad pa// ko 'phang 'dus ma byas te bzod mthong na// thub pa ko'u tam rnam par 'dred 'di ni// skye bo phal chen don brtson bden la zhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa// khyod kyis rtogs pa legs toH/
216b8(mdo): te// khyod kyis nyes par bsams ma yin// rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams la// gtso bo gang yin de blangs so// / 'od srung 'khor skyo ba skyed cig// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas// ji ltar sems
216b9(mdo): mnyam par bzhag na/ rang gi stan gi nang du myi snang bar gyurd cing // shar phyogs kyi steng ki bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ gyod la mnapa bzhi 'byed de/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam
217a1(mdo): pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/ bla kos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kapa na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
217a2(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi bston pa lags so// bston
217a3(mdo): pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// 'od srung de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srung ni khyod kyi stond pa yin no// khyod ni ra'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srung nga ni khyod kyi stond pa yin
217a4(mdo): no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srus khyod rang gi stan ci lta ba la 'dug cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung kis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
217a5(mdo): gcig tu 'khod do// de nas ma ka ra'i bram ze dang khyim bdag na mas 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyal 'od srung ral pa can gi tshangs par spyod pa la gyi spyod kyi lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
217a6(mdo): ba can nyid ni dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi se ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba
217a7(mdo): yod/ 'jig pa yod/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa
217a8(mdo): yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po yang rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ gzugs de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
217a9(mdo): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes po'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes nas/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag
217b1(mdo): gisemam mi len// myi 'dzin zhag par gyi gnas/ mngon par zhend par mi byed do// rdul po chen po rigs kyi nus sor ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa yongasu su shes na/ bdag gas 'das
217b2(mdo): kir las myi len na/ myi 'dzin/ lhag par myi gnas/ mngon par zhend par myi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas kyi len myi 'dzind lhag par myi gnas/ mngon par zhe nad par
217b3(mdo): kyi byed na/ tshad myed cing grangs myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gi khas myi len/
217b4(mdo): myi 'dzin da lhag par myi gnas/ mngon par zhend par myi byed na/ tshad myed cing grangs byed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// / de nas ma ga nga'i bram ze rang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam tu sems
217b5(mdo): te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shesadang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/ lon bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am
217b6(mdo): gso' ba po 'am ka pa zag shed las skyes sam/ shed bu 'am/ byed pa po 'am/ byed du 'jug pa po 'am/ shes pa po 'am/ kun nas shes pa po 'am slong ba po 'am/ kun nas slong pa po 'am/ sma
217b7(mdo): pa po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ kun nas tshor pa po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung 'byung bar gyi 'gyur zhing / da ltam yang yod pa ma yin pa gang kyis de dang der dge ba dang / sdig pa'i las bya ba rnams kyi rnam par sbyin pa so sor nyams su
217b8(mdo): myong zhib/ kar gyis phung po 'di bor te/ phung po gzhan dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ka da'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen
217b9(mdo): nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye ba thos pa dang / myi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes su ltung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag ce 'am/ bdag gi myed kyi/ dge sbyong
218a1(mdo): // dag skye ba na/ sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na/ yang sdug bsngal 'di 'gag so// skye ba na 'du byed 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na 'du byed 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ rgya de dang rkye nang de la rte nang nas/ sems can rnams kyi 'du
218a2(mdo): byed kyi rgyud 'dug go// / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag myi'i las 'das
218a3(mdo): pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba nas bya 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyend to// zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// dge slong dag ngas de ltar mkhyend cing / de ltar gzigs
218a4(mdo): pas pa 'di skad ces/ bdag gam sems shA nam/ zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gang nam yang ma byung 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas gang gis de dang der sdig
218a5(mdo): pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smid pa so sor nyams su myong ni/ ra kang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying 'tshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar bdags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes myi gsung
218a6(mdo): ro// de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te 'di ltar ste 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skye bas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyend kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam pa/
218a7(mdo): shes pa'i rkyend kyis mying dang gzugs// mying dang gzugs kyi rkyend kyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyend gis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyend kyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyend kyis len pa/ len
218a8(mdo): pa'i rkyend kyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen kyis skye ba la/ skye ba'i rkyend kyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gi phung po
218a9(mdo): chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste 'di myed pas 'di myed la/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gags par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes
218b1(mdo): pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas myi dang gzugs 'gaka/ mying dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reka pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas
218b2(mdo): sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas lend pa 'akag/ lend pa 'gags pas srid pa 'akaka/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
218b3(mdo): yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gags te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgya kun 'byung bas stug
218b4(mdo): bsngal kun 'byung zhing 'gags pas/ sdug bsngal 'gag ste/ rgyad bcad pas myi 'byung zhing nyid mtshams skyor babyed pas 'gags pa 'di nyid ni lus bsngal kyi mthal yin no// dge slong dag de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
218b5(mdo): gang zhe na gzhan byed kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de na nye 'am/ zhipa/ de ni 'asil bar gyur ba/ de mi nub pa ste/ dge slongangan no ba'i gnas ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ phung po thams cad spangs
218b6(mdo): pa sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ka rA yi rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka'
218b7(mdo): sprul pa/ rgyal po ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag kam myi rtag btsun pa 'di kyi rtag lags so// myi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nas/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so//
218b8(mdo): kyi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ji ka 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu las lend par byed dang /
218b9(mdo): btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag gam myi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni myi rtag lags so// myi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal
219a1(mdo): yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// myi rtag pa ste/ bsngal 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ji ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag/
219a2(mdo): ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu zhes len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na// khyod kyis gzugs gang ci yang rung 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba'i
219a3(mdo): nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag zag ring ba'am/ gang dag zag nye ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no//
219a4(mdo): zhes de de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta bzhin tu blta/ bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po de lta bas khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed gang ci yang rung ba dang / rnam par shes pa gang
219a5(mdo): ci yang chung ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'oms pa 'am/ da ltar byungab 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ran pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag zag ring ba 'am/ kang
219a6(mdo): dag zag nye bar yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin
219a7(mdo): du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni/ gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang yid
219a8(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yid 'byung na 'dod chags dang bral lo// 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par 'grol na bdag gi skye ba myed do// tshangs par spyod pa bsten to// bya ba byas so// srid
219a9(mdo): pa 'di las gzhan myi shes so// zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// ma ga da'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lnga brgyad khri dang ma ga da'i bram ze dang /
219b1(mdo): khyim bdag 'brum thag sum chos rnams lan lam kyi rtsig nus byed cing hrIs dang thal ba skyes so// shes sag pa rgyal tho ba srung sa gzugs pan nyis ma chos mayor ba dang / chos sos pa dang / chos rin pa dang / chos kyi gting srebs
219b2(mdo): ngag chom nyi las rnas pa dag the com las rgyas pa dag gzhan na rlung gyi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gis kyi bkri ba dang / smon pas stan pa'i chos rnamasas kyi 'jigs pazo dam/ spyad dmas yangs te/ thugos zag pa gcig
219b3(mdo): du gzas nas bcom ldan 'das ga pan pa de logs su wal mo sbyar la btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso lang to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /
219b4(mdo): chos dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su ma yi lags kyis dge zhen du gsol/ de man da kyi srong 'tsho'i bar tu srog dang yang bsgos te skabs su ma mi ba mngon par dang lags so// bcom ldan 'das
219b5(mdo): bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa/ la ci srid 'tsho'i bsubyam batha' chos kos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / sun dpyad kyi rkyend sman gi yo byad rnams kyis
219b6(mdo): bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kha ba tu gshegs su gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ka da'i la po ba'o sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang myi gsung bas gnang /
219b7(mdo): ngo// de nas ma ka nga'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos// bcom ldan 'das cad kyi bsu klan bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas rte/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
219b8(mdo): spyad snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ka dal nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i zhab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i 'ag
219b9(mdo): na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas/ ring po ma lon par de rnams kyi stond pa tus byas par gyurd pa dang / de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang pa nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs yongs su sdud pa dang /
220a1(mdo): // tshogs kyi 'dren par gyurd pa gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa ni de gnyis kyis 'di ltar lu bu tsa ka las gcig gis bcud ci sngar rnyed kyang de gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' ba byas so// de das
220a2(mdo): dang ldan pa rta zhul snga tro sham thabs bkos ltung zed dang chos gos thos te 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang pa dang / sna sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung zed thogs
220a3(mdo): pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de'i tshe na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab du bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par
220a4(mdo): blta ba dang / bsgrum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / lAm sbyar dang / chos kos dang / ltung zed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyom sa la rgyu ba thag ring po kho nanas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyab 'di snyam du
220a5(mdo): sems te/ rgyal po'i kha ba 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed ljags shingaganas pa dag las 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gis/ ma la bdag de'i
220a6(mdo): gan du song ste/ dge slong khyod kyi stond pa ni kang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dka' zhes dri'o snyam du rig nas/ lam po che rub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang / ldog pas che sdod cing 'dug
220a7(mdo): go de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ku nad tu rgyu nye rgyal gang na ba der song ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal kis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong dag khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung/ su'i
220a8(mdo): chos la ni dga'/ tshe dang ldan pa shag kya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ko'u ta ma shaka kya'i rigs las skra dpa' spu bregs nas kos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ba zhig yod de//
220a9(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho bo'i stond po ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no// kho bo de'i ba tu byung ngo // kho bo de'i chos la dga'o// dge slong de'i phyir chos ston
220b1(mdo): cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni gzhon pa dang rab tu byung ba gsar pas de'i phyir kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstand pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstand pa/
220b2(mdo): ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'di ltar de'i lha dad par bya'o// dge sloba'o bo la mi don dgos kyis tshig ni shin tu mang pos kyang ci bya ste/ khyod kyis don mang yang rung / nyu yang cung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta yul gyis de'i tshe chas
220b3(mdo): su bcad pas smras pa// chos rnams gang dag sgyu las byung ba dang / de'i rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge slong che/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang
220b4(mdo): bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi dmyig rdul skyed/ cing tri sa dang bral ba skyes so// de nas kun tu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /
220b5(mdo): som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan ki dro/ gyi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis myi dag pa dang / ston pas bstand/ pa'i chos rnams la myi 'jigs pa thob nas/ ro stod bsrang nas
220b6(mdo): lag pa g.yas pa rkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu
220b7(mdo): sngan cad ma mthong ba ma zos pa/ 'chi myed mya ngan myed pa'i// go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da wA ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po 'i lab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la nad 'da' ka gnas/
220b8(mdo): pa na 'di nyid na'o// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa ga phul gyis smras pa la mngon par stod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gi ga pa gnyis la mgo thos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa tra
220b9(mdo): thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ka la ba der song ngo // kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal zag ring po 'o na nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ku nang tu rmya nye rgyal la 'di skad ces/
221a1(mdo): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod ni dbang po rnams ni dang / bzhin mdog ni yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na/ khyod gis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos
221a2(mdo): stond cig/ de nas kun tu nye rgyal gis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pas smras pa// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang // de'i rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal da te// de dag gsung
221a3(mdo): ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che// tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan cig brjod cig tshe dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / zhes pa las stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu
221a4(mdo): rgyu pang nas skyes chos rnams kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba ste/ sa so// de nas ku nad tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos thos dpa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi
221a5(mdo): las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gis dring myi/ 'jog pa dang / gzhan kis myi bkri ba dang / stond pas stand pa'i/ chos rnams la myi 'jigs pa thob nas/ ro stod bsrang nas lag
221a6(mdo): pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// skyob pa rnams ni chos 'di yin// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sngon can ma mthong/
221a7(mdo): ma zos pa'i// 'chi myed mya ngan myed pa'i kong 'phang 'di la rje su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ka la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i zhab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o// tshe dang
221a8(mdo): ldan pa tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par spyad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir rje 'khor la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu myi grags pa dang ldan pa shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la
221a9(mdo): blta ba ni legs pa yin no// de nas kun tu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la shes par gyis shig// kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar
221b1(mdo): tshangs par spyad par spyod par byed ma/ khyed cag ji ltar byed/ mkhan po gnyis bdag cag cung zad mi 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis la brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom
221b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung bar bgyi'o// bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig/ de nas kun tu rgyu
221b3(mdo): nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag tu ma'i kung la chos ston cing zhugs so// bcom
221b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis krokra po'i tshogs yongs
221b5(mdo): su sdud pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/ tshogs kyi 'dun nas/ 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dang par nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo // 'di gnyis ni zung thos zung dang / zung gi mchog
221b6(mdo): dang / zung bzang por gyur da te/ gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam sa kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// yin na dang nas kyis gtu 'gyur ro// de nas dge zeng na gags de ca sa su ya dpa smras pa// ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa/
221b7(mdo): skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon// bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pa// grogs po nye rgyal par nas skyes// 'od ma'i tshal du ma phyind par// de ltar 'chi ba gzigs gyur da nas// tshogs mchog dbus
221b8(mdo): su de gnyis ni// 'di gnyis nga'i nyan thos kyi// zung mchog 'gyur zhes des bstand de// cig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog// gcig ni shes rab ldan pa'i// mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad// de
221b9(mdo): nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang par nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das kang na ba der dong ste phyind nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// /
222a1(mdo): a// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyed pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po snang ba/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi sun snga ma tshangs par spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o// bcom
222a2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba bas rab tu byung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog// tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'dug kho na sgra byi ba dang / snam sbyar
222a3(mdo): gyon par gyur pa te/ lag na ltung zed thogs pa skra dpa kha stu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen pa rdzogs nas lo brgya lon po'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyurd to// yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pa/
222a4(mdo): sma phyi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod la dbang po rab zhir kanas kya rud te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur pa// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thams bgos// lhung zed dang / chos
222a5(mdo): gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de/ nas rgyal po'i zhab kyi myi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can ki mu stegs can ki gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs napa ring po ma lon pas/ yid
222a6(mdo): ma rangs zhing / mngon par myi dka' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas/ co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// sangs rgyas ma ka ra dag gis// krong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag
222a7(mdo): rgyal ba'i kun khrod nas// phyi nad cad ci zhig dkri bar bya// des dge slong nams spang gong zhing / myi dka' ba dang / myi 'jigs pa myed par gyu rad to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i zhab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas/ zas kyi bya
222a8(mdo): ba byas te/ phyi dro bsod snyoms myi len pas/ lhung zed dang chos kos ma'o su phab nas/ rkang pa bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde bas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong nas phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
222a9(mdo): gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang
222b1(mdo): po dag snga dro shams thabs 'tshal/ lhung zed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi myi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gi mu stegs can ki gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen
222b2(mdo): par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs zhing mngon par myi dga' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dag de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// sangs rgyas ma ka da dag gyis grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs
222b3(mdo): pas// yang dag rgyal ba kun khrid na// phyin cad ci zhig dkri bar bya// zhes mchi nas des bdag cag rnams spa kor zhing myi dga' ba dang / myi 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur da to// bcom ldan 'das yang bka' stsal pa// dge slong
222b4(mdo): dag rgyal po'i khab kyi de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad zer ba nas dal 'di skad ces/ 'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la// mkhas pa su
222b5(mdo): zhig myi bzod byed ces brjod na/ 6/ rgyal po'i zhab kyi myi de skad zer/ ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du myed par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rab tu mang
222b6(mdo): po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung zed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de na rgyal po'i zhab kyi myi gang dag yang des rkyal ba can gi mu stegs can gi gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs
222b7(mdo): nas ring po ma lon pas// yid ma rangs zhing mngon par gyi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas mo 'dri zhib tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// sangs rgyas ma gang dag gis// grong mchog rgyal po'i 'ab gshegs
222b8(mdo): pam// yang dag rgyal ba kun khrid na// phyin cad ci zhig dkri bar bya// de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// 'di na dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de// de dag chos
222b9(mdo): kyis khrid mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhig bzod myi byed// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po'i khab tu myi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa gang yin pa de sas cad du myed par gyur pa to// de nas sangs
223a1(mdo): a// rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'gom byed zas sbyin gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// ko sa la'i rgyal lo gas la rgyal gyis rgyal po bas gtsang la 'phrin yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed tu gsol// khyod
223a2(mdo): kyi sras kyis bdud ba rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba com par byed do zhes spang ba/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis zos nas/ pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya kang dang kang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par
223a3(mdo): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab byung bar gyurang to// rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya kang dang kang gtang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo // snyam
223a4(mdo): nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha khyod ci'i slad du phyag las gtad nas thugs dges shing bzhu kas/ des smras pa 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub
223a5(mdo): pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i myi bta ba la sa/ de dag kho bo'i gad du 'ongs nas/ gzho nu don thams cad grub ba babyag pa 'di dang 'dis bcug mo zhes lnga'o// da naM kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i myi
223a6(mdo): btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te myi 'ong na/ ji ltar sems long sa su chud par myi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa lnga bdag mchis te bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o// rgyal po zas katsang gis smras pa/
223a7(mdo): 'char ka gang dag gang song ba de dang de'i stand pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// 'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchil sa
223a8(mdo): so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis phrin yig bris pa// lhums su zhugs pas bzung nas su// khyod ni bdag kyis cher bskrun nas// nyon mongs mye rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal po ljon shing la stan
223a9(mdo): na// de ni khyod kyi slob ma yi// yal a/ lcag ma 'phel 'gyur bas// gzhan ni bde bas dka' bar 'gyur/ bdag ni bsdug bsngal sgral bar ldan// gzhan yang kang kis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na//
223b1(mdo): bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te// bu gcig yul myis 'bras bus yongs su spyad pa thob gyur da na// de la yon tan 'bras bu myi ster khyod la snying rje myed// gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na// nyid don sgrubs
223b2(mdo): nas gnyen rnams ni// shi nad tu che zad phan gdags zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni// khyod kyi zhi gnas de brnyes nas// bdag dang gnyis kyi tshogs rnams la zugs rtse rjes su bzung mdzad de/ gshegs pa
223b3(mdo): dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas rim gis mnyan yod du phyind pa dang / lam kis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka pan ba der ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
223b4(mdo): po zas gtsang gis gsol pa'i yi ge legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas blags so// blags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang /
223b5(mdo): 'char kas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags so/ ma skya'i gzhir rtsi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ dpa/ 'char ka 'dod ngo // 'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang
223b6(mdo): lhag par 'dris pa yin pas/ de sngon gi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gyi bzhud dang bdag gi mthus bkri ba bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la
223b7(mdo): tshigs su de bka' stsa lad pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing // sred 'gas dkra bi yod pa ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas gyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi byed na ni kang gi gzhi yis dkri// gang zhig
223b8(mdo): yul gi rgyal mor ma chags shing // sred 'gas dkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i chal mnga' de// gzhi myed na ni keng gi gzhi yis dkri// gang zhig bcom ldan brtsegs pa myed 'gyur zhing /
223b9(mdo): 'jig rten ma bcom chung zad yod myin pa// sangs rgyas yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi byed na ni gang ki gzhi yis dkri// lan la spobs pa myed nas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mchi ste// rgyal po zas gtsang
224a1(mdo): // ma la rig par bgyi'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas gsol da pa// bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis/ khyod kyang rab tu byung shi ke/ bcom ldan 'dra
224a2(mdo): bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems
224a3(mdo): dpa' gyur pa na/ yab dang yum dang / ma khan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma zlogs pas/ 'char kas gsol da pa// bcom ldan 'das kal te
224a4(mdo): de lta na rab tu byu ba lags so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal da pa/ sha ri'i bu 'char ka 'di'i yun ring po 'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu byung shi ka/ btsun pa bka'
224a5(mdo): bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa ga ri'i bus bcom ldan 'dasal mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas na/ kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas// 'char 'di ni
224a6(mdo): khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud myed dang / lhan cig khangapa gcig tu nyal bar myi bya'o zhes bya ba dag ko// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i rkang pa
224a7(mdo): gnyis la mgo bos byaka byas te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
224a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i bzhir mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod mod kho na brgyal po'i khab du ma 'jug par sgo la sdod la shaka kya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par
224a9(mdo): bya'o// gal te sbron cig zer na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas kal te sha ka kya'i dge slong gzhan ya yod dam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ya pa 'di 'dra zhing ma byang
224b1(mdo): 'di 'dra'am zhes 'drin/ 'di 'dra na'ang cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par myi bya'o// kal te gzho nu dod thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par myi byed dam/
224b2(mdo): zhes 'dri na/ myi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o// ka la te kar du gnas par byed ces 'drin/ dkon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khar mi 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal
224b3(mdo): byed kyi 'tshal gyi rnam pa bril te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzho nu don thams cad grub pa byon napa zhes 'dris/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o// 'i ming gcig mabyor zhes 'drim/ zhag bdun lon na'o// zhes 'jos par/
224b4(mdo): bya'o// des gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ song bzhig ma bdag rnams ni tshig gis te// lha rnams bsam pas 'grub 'gyur zhing // de bzhin
224b5(mdo): bsam gtan pa rnams kyi/ sems bslad pa pa rnamams cad/ 'jug// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kade'i nga/ skad cig de nyid la grong khyim se sku'i gan song ba de ltar byed kyis
224b6(mdo): rlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'chang babacom ldan 'das la dang ba drag po skyes pa de rgyal ba'i khab kyi sgong bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shag kya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsom cig/
224b7(mdo): de rnams kyis smras pa/ migag kya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shag kya'i dge slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs
224b8(mdo): pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ mthong nas smras pa/ 'cham ka rab tu byung ngas/ lnga rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo // zhes smras pa ma yin nas/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis mangs
224b9(mdo): rgyas kyi mo nyan 'dis bu ma yin no// zhes bka' yul nas/ chos 'dul ba legs pa sa gsungs pa'i phyir/ bdag rab tu byung mod kyi// bdag rang gi dang pas kyang / rab tu 'byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thom
225a1(mdo): cad kyis/ mkhyud nas bstan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug go// de'i don du chu btsags pa dang / 'bras bu btags pa ka tsang sbra byas te zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /
225a2(mdo): dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing / ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i mchog yongs su longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te/ smras pa/ 'char ka ji gzho nu don thams cad grub pa yang / 'di 'dra bar nye
225a3(mdo): bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni chung zad tsam lags so// dper na ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// brgya mtsho dang smyig rjes bzhin no// nyi ma dang srin bu
225a4(mdo): me khyer bzhin no// nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ka bzhin no// rgyal po zas ka tsang kis smras pa/ 'char ka gzho nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra
225a5(mdo): zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas ka tsang rgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa// 'char ka kazho nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas smras
225a6(mdo): pa/ lha byon no/ dus ci tsam ma/ dkung bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas katsang kis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan gzho nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur kis/ rgyal po'i kha ba dang po brang
225a7(mdo): byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni brang du bzhugs par myi mdzad do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dkon pa 'am gtsuka la ka pha du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang
225a8(mdo): kyis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal rnam par ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas rgyal po ba blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro da'i kun
225a9(mdo): dka' ra ba'i rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal gi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po drug brgya dang / khang phran bcu drug rtsig tu chu gcig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas katsa las mnyan nas n+ya gro da'i kund dka'
225b1(mdo): ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nam pa gtsug khang chen po bcu drug dang // khang phran bcu drug rtsig tu bcuka ko/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mye'u 'akal ki bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da te/ mye'u 'gal
225b2(mdo): dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras bdan 'dzom na/ khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgos shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan
225b3(mdo): pa me'u gi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slongab rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi gnas te 'dad 'job ra/ khyed cag su la blta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long zhig sus
225b4(mdo): bka' stsal pa to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dus la 'dul ba/ ba 'khor zhib/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs kyi nang pa/ 'khor dbugs byi nang parnam par dul ba 'khor nam par dul ba/ dgra patso/
225b5(mdo): pa 'khor dgra bcom pag 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba mdzes pa 'khor mengs pa/ khyu mchog pa la bag tshogs kyis bsgom pa lta bu gla po che glang po che phrug gu'i cho
225b6(mdo): kyis bsko pa lta bu/ se ge ma me ba cad gi tshogs kyis bsko pa lta bu/ rang ba'i rgyal po rang pa'i tshogs kyis bsgom pa lta yun dab mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor pa lta bu/ zam ze slob ma'i tsham
225b7(mdo): kyis bcwo ma ma sa lug smadad pa mkhas pa dang po'i tshogs kyis bskor la lta bu/ dpa' bo chu pa'i tshogs kyis bskom pa lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor pa lta bu/ ded dpon chong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor rabab
225b8(mdo): lta lug khams kyi rgyal po khrod pa'i tshogs kyis banor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po stong kyis bskor ba lta bu/ zlab rgyu gang gatshogs kyis bskor pa lta ba bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stod kyis bskor ba lta bu 'ayul 'khor
225b9(mdo): sru ba dri ba'i tshogs kyis la skom pa lta phug 'phags skyes po tshul lus gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ myig myi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor da pa lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin ka tshogs kyis bskor pa lta bu
226a1(mdo): zag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor pa lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba myed pa
226a2(mdo): lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang / bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shi nad tu tul bas spyod lam gi tshul 'khrugs pa/ sku skye na po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgya nad pa/ dpe' byad
226a3(mdo): bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs brgya dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
226a4(mdo): ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byond to// rgyal po zas ka tsang kyis gzho nu
226a5(mdo): don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byond to zhes thos so// zos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan
226a6(mdo): kyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhi nang tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar ba shams// dang gi chun 'phyang mang po sbyangs te/ ka pa yang 'bab chu ro hita ka nas kang yang n+ya kro da'i kun dka' ra ba de'i kyi lam shin tu
226a7(mdo): mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar ba dan rnam par dkra ba dag sham du bcug go// de na 'bab chu ro hi ta ka la dge slong la gcig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do// kha gcig ni so shing 'dod par byed do// kha cig
226a8(mdo): ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shag kya rnams kyis gzho nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha gcig ni sngon kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thos
226a9(mdo): cad na 'gro ba'i kun dka' mnas byung ste/ ci yab mas kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te zhabs kyis me
226b1(mdo): 'i gzhir gshegs nas/ shag kya'i brgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzho nu don thams cad grub pas/ dka' thub gi gnas su gshegs nas// ltog po zhog grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lnga brgya stong phrag du mas zhab 'bring byas nas steng gi/
226b2(mdo): nam mkha' las gshegs te/ des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyes kyis 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi
226b3(mdo): steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba mdzang ngo ro// me'i ting nge 'dzin da la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad/
226b4(mdo): de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas pa ldan 'das kyi sku la 'od ze marnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin pam mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / mar po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
226b5(mdo): dang / leb rgan dang / shel gi kha dog dag so// cho 'phrul thu du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas 'bar 'bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa/ de lta bum
226b6(mdo): ti nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la dzis bar lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul
226b7(mdo): gi cho 'phrul mngon par 'phya mdzad pa de bsdus te// ta la brgyad ki sring na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o//
226b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das lnga'i mid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i mid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i ming tsaman ni dge slong rnams gsum gi ming tsam so// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsas na ni dge
226b9(mdo): nams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud gi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams kyi drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o//
227a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gi srid tsam na ni dge
227a2(mdo): slong rnams gnyis kyi sri tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams myi gang lhaka tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das myi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas
227a3(mdo): gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te/ rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na gos ngur smyin
227a4(mdo): gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzho nu ga pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags so// srid pa mthar byed sems
227a5(mdo): kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyid byed don ni kund tu rdzogs mdzad lags// 'di ni dgongs pa bzhi brnyes stobs bcu mang bas kun gi pha rol gshegs pa
227a6(mdo): lags/ dri khyed rtsa ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi khram lags kyidabang de gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kyis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa//
227a7(mdo): bro gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ kun sbyang zhabs la yan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltam pa'i tshems na g.yos pa dag/ ka'adzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shag kya dpazhag kya mo rnams kyis
227a8(mdo): rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btag pa mthong nas/ da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa'i ci'i mtha' tshig ces ma dad pa skyed do// rgyal lo las gtsang kyis shag kya dang / shaka mo rnaMs
227a9(mdo): la go bar bya ba'i phyir// 'di skad ces smras log/ gshes ldan dag da gdod khe bas gnonu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshi gzho nu don thams cad grub pa de bskam pa nas chen
227b1(mdo): de gsos par gyur cing / 'dzin rten 'di thams ca lda ba rgyachen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten/ 'jig rten gi yang gi sung pa zu nas/ lag tu chu pa nyim da sa di gnyis 'dis sulam ldan/
227b2(mdo): 'di gyu ma rgyam ma maud kyi rnab sa thams sum myong bgang yin pa de yang rdo ma snang chen po sa gsal par gyud nas sems can dang dag skyes pa ga snru sa dmamamam can dan de byed gis ga c-ig sa nas/ sa
227b3(mdo): ldan dag semams can gzhan dag kyang 'di skyes pa sa/ ka shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag gyu 'dir skyes pa lta zhes la zhes pam gyur da gsas pa la po sa byang chub sems dpa'i 'bal la mgo mos phyag byas so//
227b4(mdo): gang gi rtse gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhi zlas kyi mtha'am gzigs pa na/ shing 'jam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nasan 'dod ba rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa kyi dge ba'i chos rnams las
227b5(mdo): dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang / bde ba zag pa myed pa'i dang / mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/
227b6(mdo): shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni/ gar phyogs su gzhos gang phyogs su 'bag gar phyogs su lab kyang / shing 'angs thum grib la'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das pa mgyur
227b7(mdo): banab tshe yang ngo ma ma mad du byung ba'i chos des da phe ba'i yid 'grus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sa yang byag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang gsum phyag byas so// de bas
227b8(mdo): na 'di skad ces blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// sku spyad zhabs la lan gsum phyeg bgyis te// bltam pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smras so//
227b9(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas/ 'khor brgya phrag tu ma zild kyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gi gu pa la ba dan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas
228a1(mdo): rgyal po zas gtsang mi skad 'dze ba zhing byig ma mims ga pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis su bzhus pa// gzhal byed khang gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab
228a2(mdo): bzhugs pa dang // dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su// ji lta bur ni 'bab zhig bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mye'i bdag po gang du ni// khyim ki 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags
228a3(mdo): pa yi ni gnas pa bcu// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol dpa/ ba so gser ki cha ba can// shi na tu bde ba gting ba'i/ khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las// gting ba las ni ji ltar mnal//
228a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po nam krol kan sa mal ni// dka' ba byang chub yan lag ki// me tog dkram par chags myed cing // yongs su gdung ba rnams spangs mnal ka/ rgyal po
228a5(mdo): gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// glang po shing rta rtasabazhud pa// tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
228a6(mdo): pa// nga'i shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang // yang dag rtsol ba'i gzhol ba yis// sa kun rnam par rgyun yang // nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa myed/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo sngon ni she sha ka'i/
228a7(mdo): na bza' banabs nas mdzes pa las// dur smrig rtsub pa'i gos banabs pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sku'i bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po ra'i kos ngo tsha// sha ma nga'i bgo ba snam sbyar da te// de bgos thub pa
228a8(mdo): zhi ba rnams gnags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gi gnod pa nas// bu ma'i ro ldan 'bras ldan gsol ba las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod
228a9(mdo): snyoms ni// phal pa gsol ba ji ltar makur du mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa// zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par 'byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'ing ni chosa'i mchog gsol mod kyi//
228b1(mdo): 'jig rten kun la snying rtse'i phyir spyod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsolang pa// makur du bde ba yang bgyid pa'i// kun skyems kha ra'i rab gsol na// rnyog pa can la dri nga'i// chab ni ji ltar zhig tu gsol// bcom ldan
228b2(mdo): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mye'i bdag po gang 'thungs pa// bdag la 'thungs pa thams cad ni// dug dang 'dra bar gyur da pa// chab kyi ro mchog pa 'thung ngo // rgyal po las gtsang gis gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod sngon
228b3(mdo): gsil khang gzhal myed khang // khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs// da lta gcig mu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa// blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs pa myed par bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
228b4(mdo): ko'u ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa// dri ma bag chags bcas par yang spangs pas// da ni mya ngan 'jig pa myed gnas te// nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad myed// rgyal po zas kan+da ni gsol pa// khyod sngon khrus khang
228b5(mdo): shind du yi 'ong ba'i khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag pa'i/ la na// gcig bu khyong ni nags thod gnas ldan par// grub dbang da// mu zhig zhus mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas
228b6(mdo): pa// ko'u ta ma chos kyi 'tsho bran dri byed pa// tshul khrims 'dugangogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan gyi dkun/ lus kyi gshe bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po khas gtsang
228b7(mdo): gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni// gser rdul bum pas zhus mdzad na// rtog pa can la dri nga ba'i chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ko'u ta ma ji ltar dang po'i//
228b8(mdo): 'bab chu rnyog pa myed// bsod snyoms 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan gyi bkrus na// lus myi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol da pa// dpa' bo khyod
228b9(mdo): sngon ser skya'i// tsan dan kis ni sku khrus shing // ka shi mchog gnas mdzes pa las// de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshul khrims sa pa'i rgyan yin te// tshul khrims
229a1(mdo): // nyid ni byug pa yin// gser dang nor bu na tsa dag/ rmongs skyes pa la ci zhig bya// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// gang gyis khyod ni khyod du gsod// gang las 'jigs su rung ba ste// yid 'byung ba yang /
229a2(mdo): ka pa las skye// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa// gang gis pa ni khyad gsod du/ ni/ ga pa dgagapa yid 'byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya// rka dpan dang mas
229a3(mdo): ba ste// gal te 'di gsum yod myi na// pa yang ni nang du yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la mi dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zlag gis gsol pa// sha kra rnams kyi yid dka' ba// legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo
229a4(mdo): legs// khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bur yang ma gros so// de nas dad pa rab dka' rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor byas nas// thub pa'i zhabs la 'go bos phyag byas te// bde bar
229a5(mdo): gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug// de nas rgyal po zas katsang 'di snyam du sems te// gang bdag kyis bus yon tan gi cho ga sa 'di lta bu thob pa ni// bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo//
229a6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya kro da'i kun dga' ra bar// 'khor de yi bsam pa dang / bka la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de de thos pas zas dkar
