249a4(mdo): myi snang zhing gser ki kha dog tu gyurd to// kun du chung srong bango da sa gi do bu par do mying gser gi mdog ces bya bar gyur da te/ de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur da te/ de ro mtshar mchog tu gyur da to// de nas drang srong
249a5(mdo): ko'u ta mas smras pa// mkhan po bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ 'gro ba ni kang / skye ba ni kang / tshe phyi ma gang zhig lags// des smras pa/ bu bram ze rnams na re bu myed pa la 'gro ba myed do
249a6(mdo): zhes zer na/ khyod kyis bu 'ga' skyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po bdag gis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba ma bskyed pa na/ bdag gzho nu rab tu byung bas/ bud myed kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gi bu skye ba
249a7(mdo): lta ga la mchis/ bu kal te de lta na sngon yul spyad pa rjes su dran par gis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas/ da ni bdag gi gnad nams chad cing tshigs rnams phye ste/ 'akum pa gcig tu dran
249a8(mdo): par bas na/ ji ltar sngon ki yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur// de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gis ji char chen po sprul nas/ char pa'i rigs pas de'i lus la
249a9(mdo): 'bog pa dang / de nas thar pa chung grang mi'i reg pas sdug bsngas rnam par man nas/ res sdod gi yul sa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so// gang na me sa 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas
249b1(mdo): pa las/ khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis zag dang lhan cig ltung ngo // bsam gis kyi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/ bdag sems dpa' dal dang / 'jig rten sems dpa' dang / sems can rnams kyil gyi rnam par
249b2(mdo): sbyin pa sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems dpa'o// khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga las su gyur nas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis sbyin nas rdol pa
249b3(mdo): dang / khye'u gnyis shig byung nas de dang ha cang yang myi ring ba'i bu ram shing tshil gseb der de gnyis zhugs so// de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong ko'u ta ma gdungs nas shi'o//
249b4(mdo): de nas drang srong ka ser mdog 'ongs nas/ shi ba mthod gsal shing gi nyen 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol ba'i 'og pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod cing / bu rim shing gi tshal gseb du zhugs pa las ji
249b5(mdo): tsam mkhye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo // des de gnyis su'i bu yin zhe/ des bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong ko'u ta ma'i yin par gyurd nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de kany+tsi
249b6(mdo): bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun snyod de/ des de gnyis mying btag/ sa pa nyi ma shar pa'i tshe/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer kis smin par byas pa/ las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas/ de bas na nyi ma'i rigs
249b7(mdo): yin pas/ des na nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya ba bar gyur to// drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas/ mying gnyis pa ko'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyurd to// rang gi yan lag las skyes pas/ mying gsum pa
249b8(mdo): yan lag la skyes yan lag la skyes zhes bya bar gyurd to// bu rab shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas/ mying bzhi pa bu ras shing pa chu gyur to// ci tsem na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra da tsa bu myed par shi nas
249b9(mdo): blon po rnams 'dus nas gros byas par brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang skur par bya// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen go'u ta ma drang srong rnams kyi na pad+ma rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'odi ni
250a1(mdo): de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas/ drang srong gser mdog ki drung du song ste/ son pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa// drang srong
250a2(mdo): chen po ko'u ta ma kang du mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang myi dran na/ ji ltar bsad kho bo bdag cag dran par bya'o// ma
250a3(mdo): nongs so// des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de mying tsam smos pa/ yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhog shig/ des sdig pa'i las ci byas 'di
250a4(mdo): dang 'di'o// skyon myed pa gnod pa myed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do// de ltar ci mngon des ji ltar gyur da pa rgyas par smras pa dang // de rnams kyi yid myi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/
250a5(mdo): drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma lags kyi bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du smra bar byed pa dan/ khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so// blon
250a6(mdo): po rnams kyis smras pa// drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i bu lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o// de rnams rgyas smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi mya
250a7(mdo): pi lags// de byung ba dang / bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis de thos te/ mchog tu po mtshar skyes nas/ de rnams kyis drang srang de la gsol ba btab nas/ de gnyis las kazho nu phu lo zhes
250a8(mdo): rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur ba las de yang bu myed par shi'o// de nas gcig gos nu bo dbang bskur nas/ de'i mying rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu raM
250a9(mdo): shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzind du byung ste// de rnams kyi za ma ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo //
250b1(mdo): ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa/ 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gtong dang / lag na dang / glang po che 'dul ba dang / rkang gdub can no// dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ de lag
250b2(mdo): pa 'gram pa la gtad te/ de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag zhal la gtad de/ thugs kyi dges shing bzhugs// des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/
250b3(mdo): ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing myi 'dug lha gal te de lta ma nyi 'og gi rgyal rnams la/ bu mo mchis na/ ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa myi btsal/ rgyal los smras pa/ gzho nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas
250b4(mdo): phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod na/ da la su zhig bu mo sder bar 'gyur/ lha dgongs shika dang bdag cag kis btsal lo/ ji ltar na rgyal po gzhan zhig bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na stug pa/ mdzes pa btsun
250b5(mdo): mo dam par btsal ba yod pa de myi rnams kyis brtags te/ rgyal po/ 'i drung du 'ongs nas de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba khug shig
250b6(mdo): de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spya ngar dong nas/ rkang pa gnyis la btugs te// thog yar gtam byas nas 'dug go// gtam gi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha dkra shis par gyurd cig/ dkra
250b7(mdo): shes par gyur da cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol// rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa yum nas/ de'i ched du sras mo spong ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab mi 'bab pa'i
250b8(mdo): mchog yin pas ru ra na/ 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par 'gyur na/ de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag pa bltan sbyin no// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal mchis lha snyan du gdas par gsol/
250b9(mdo): lo zhes de rnams dong nas/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzho nu ches phung por gyur da pa rgyal srid la mngon par dka' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal
251a1(mdo): shrIH/ srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no// sgra don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te re shig btsun mo blangs la lha dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dges pa dang / dges dgur spyod pa mdzod cig/ de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on/
251a2(mdo): te bu mor 'gyur ram/ spyir ma mchis par 'gyur su 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de ltar na depal long shig/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ tsi tsis na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang
251a3(mdo): rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par 'gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dka' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' dkur spyod par byed pas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan
251a4(mdo): par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dku 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na stug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas de la las sngon rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i mying cir gdags zhes 'dogs pa
251a5(mdo): byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lnga 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du/ khye'u yi myong / ni rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyal srid dka' ma ma/
251a6(mdo): brkyang sa rjes su gtad do zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pangam bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rgyal 'chab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zha
251a7(mdo): po rgyal pos thozos nas/ des des po nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub po dang bcas pa'i in yig spring ba/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang
251a8(mdo): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol dkyi pha rol da gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig/ kho bo 'o ni 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar klag go// rgyal po de mthu' chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag te/ blon po rnams stsogs te smras
251a9(mdo): pa/ shes ldan dag pal rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar sgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dka' rgyal tshab du dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzho nu ches bu khor
251b1(mdo): gyu da pa/ rgyal srid la mngon par dgal ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyis dbang 'askum pa 'di mi 'os pa yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po de ni stobs dang gzhon pa skyes pas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon gyi tshag
251b2(mdo): babar yul bur mar klog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal 'tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa de dbang skur la/ gzho nu de rnams ni spug tu gsol/ rgyal pos spras pa// shes ldan dag skyon myed cing /
251b3(mdo): gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzho nu rnams ji ltar spyag/ lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha sman par bgyi ba lhur lend pa legs pas skyon ma mchis pa dang nongs pa ma mchis par yang spyug la skyon ma mchis pa dang /
251b4(mdo): nongs par bgyis pa ni bzhag go// rgyal po btang snyoms su gzhag nas cang myi smra bar 'dug ko// blon po rnams 'tshogs nas pan tshun tu gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs gcig
251b5(mdo): bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la zug zung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de nas sems kyis bskyed mos tshal du byi dor byas pa ni ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i phog por nye bar
251b6(mdo): gzhag/ dar gi chun 'phang mar po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dka' dka' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcugo// de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas
251b7(mdo): mthong nas gzho nu rgod bag can de rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo // blon po rnams bskyed mos tshal gi byi dor byas nas skor byung ba dang gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i bskyed mos tshal/ de rnams
251b8(mdo): kyis smras pa lnga'i legs so// de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shika/ ci'i phyir slar ldog/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshul can
251b9(mdo): na 'dir 'jug tu ka la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lnga 'am kazho nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ma mchis te/ de rnams nang du zhugs te brtse bar brtsams so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa//
252a1(mdo): 5/ grwa bskyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so// rgyal po chas pa dang skyed mos tshal na gu co'i sgra thos bo// zos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan
252a2(mdo): dag skyed mos tshal na ku tsho'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis spras pa/ lha gzho nu rnams so// gal te de lta na ngas gzho nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha
252a3(mdo): bzod par mdzad cing gzho nu rnams spang bar gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzho nu de rnams sprug pa chad pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'an
252a4(mdo): gi skye bo dang / lhan gcig mchi na de ci nas kyang myi 'gag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na// de rnams la dka' ba'i pho brang 'khor ki myi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /
252a5(mdo): de rnams lhan gcig chas te/ zhag bdun du krong khyer gru 'dzin gi sgo phye nas/ skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer kau sgo ma bkum na/ ring po myi
252a6(mdo): thogs par mu 'dzind/ stong par 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na sgo chod cig de nas gzho nu de rnams rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthard kyis ri 'o kangs ki ri dang / nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser
252a7(mdo): skya'i sti gnas dang ha cang yang myi ring ba zhig tu phyind nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/ gnas btab nas ri dgas bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum tu trang srong ser skya'i sti gnas su 'dong par
252a8(mdo): byed do// lang 'tsho dang dpal bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shi nad tu nyen te/ sha bri ran pa skya bo seng ser por gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i
252a9(mdo): phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur nga/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag kyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shind tu nyen pas so// des sa smras parang rang gi sring mo spangs la/ mas dben gyi
252a10(mdo): zi mo rnams dang lhan cig bdug ci sa drang mong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bkyi mi rung ngam shes di skar rgyal rigs bral sri sto pa rnams kyis chung po// de na de rnams drang sro ga
252b1(mdo): cig ni chad ma yin no zhes nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyes pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ mas dben gi sring mo nas dang ldan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed// de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse
252b2(mdo): bar byed/ dka' bar byed/ dkal dgur spyod par byed pa na/ shu po dang bu mo dag btsas te/ de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser skya'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas rbe
252b3(mdo): ldan dag mthong zin kyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir bsam gtan gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub pas so// drang srong chen pa khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/ bdag cag bzhan
252b4(mdo): du mtshan 'odan kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phog shig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba grub pa yin pas/ de gser gi bya ma bum blangs te/
252b5(mdo): chu'i rgyun gis grong khyer ki rna pa dag bris nas/ de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so// drang srong ser skya de nas kya kyi phyi'i gzhi yo/ ngas su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to// de rnams
252b6(mdo): de 'aper ba gyur du pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/ rog bal 'phel che ba ma gyur da to// lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig bstand pa dang / de nis
252b7(mdo): der dong ste/ grong khyer gcig shos brtsigs nas lngas bstan lhas bstan ces bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams 'tshogs shing 'dus nas/ phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir/ bdag cag
252b8(mdo): sprugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs de las kyu rad kyis/ de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang bar myi bya ste/ gcig lo nas chog shes par bya'o// de rnams rigs
252b9(mdo): mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len ki chung ma ni myi len to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu stug pa rnams rjes su dran nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag kazho nu de nas/
253a1(mdo): da ltar ga na 'dug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ skam nongs pa 'ga' zhig las sprugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na/ gangs li dang nye bcu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser tshur/
253a2(mdo): bsti gnas dang gcang myi ring ba zhig tu gnas te/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben ki sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid dka' bar bgyid/ dka' mgur spyod par bgyid do// de rnams che bar bgyid/ dka' bar bgyid/ dka' mgu
253a3(mdo): spyod par bgyid pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so// grong pa dag gzho nu rnams kyis de ltar byed pod dam/ lha rdo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram gong pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrang nas la ka pa kayas pa brkyang ste/ ched
253a4(mdo): tu brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shi nad tu phod pa yin no// zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// zhes sems dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye
253a5(mdo): ma ka zho nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma kazhon nu ni shin tu phod 'apa yi// na no// kye ma gzhon nu ni phod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shag/ kya shaka kya zhes bya bar gyur da to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu
253a6(mdo): shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dka' rgyal srid la dab skur ro// de yang bu myed par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbangaphyuka la dbang byed du bcug go// de yang bu myed par shi nas laka na n+ya
253a7(mdo): bor gyu rad to// de yang bu byed par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur da to// de yang bu med par shi lda na to// de'i bu gnas 'jog go// ko& ta ma dka gnas 'jog ki bu sa khyim mo// ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa khye
253a8(mdo): bu dang / pha bo dang yang cha dang / sum tsha rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong krong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi pha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shi rta brgya pa dang / shing ta dgu bcu pa dang / shing ta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang /
253a9(mdo): brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / kazhu dku bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang gzhu bkram dang / kazhu brtan no// ko'u ta ma dag gzho brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gram dang / ser ge sgra'o//
253b1(mdo): koT ta ya dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu bogs 'i snyed yod pa/ de rnams kyi nang na seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so// koT ta ma dag me ne'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ bas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / the bo zas dang / bdud
253b2(mdo): ci zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre bo ma dang / bdud rtsi mo'o// zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo'o// zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba dang / shag
253b3(mdo): kye'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ mying chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// bdud rtsi zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo dang lhas sbyin no// gtsang ma'i bu ni legs pa sad do//
253b4(mdo): dkar mo'i bu ni 'phreng ba can no// bre bo ma'i babang len no// bdud daci mo'i ni dge 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras na sgra gcan 'dzin yin te// ko'u ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi rgyud tshe dang ldan pa
253b5(mdo): sgra gcan 'dzi nad du rdzogs/ mid pa'i phreng chud cad/ 'khor 'i da de// da ni yang med pa myed do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gul ki bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par
253b6(mdo): mkhyend nas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal ki bu chen po la bka' stsas dpa/ mo'u 'akal kau bu legs so legs so// mo'u dkal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du/
253b7(mdo): shag kya rnams kyi sngon gi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang / khyod legs so// mo'u 'akal ki bu yang khyod kyis shaka kya rnams kyi rigs las bcams te/ chos kyigatam rtag tu smos shika dang des na de/
253b8(mdo): nams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bge' slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shag kya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos
253b9(mdo): kyi gtam chongs shig/ zung shig ltogs shig// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shaka kya rnams kyi sngon gi rigs rgyud la brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dag
254a1(mdo): a/ ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shag kya rnams kyi sngon gi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam bzung zhing klag pa'i rigs so// de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i rigs kyi gas
254a2(mdo): kye rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dka' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya
254a3(mdo): 'i gzhin rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos gang ba/ 'bab pa dang / zab po dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
254a4(mdo): dang / chom rkun myed cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun gsum tshogs pa na / bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong
254a5(mdo): khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid/ byed du bcug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos kang ba/ 'thab pa dang /
254a6(mdo): zab mo dang / brtsod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / chos kun byed cing nang rab tu zhi bar gyur da pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / lang dang / ma he pun gsum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa
254a7(mdo): bzhin du rgyal sring skyong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yul gi bzang mo yum byin zhes bya ba yod do// lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor
254a8(mdo): mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam zos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa nam zos kyi bu'i nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba na me tog phun gsum pa dang / 'bras bu phun gsum tshogs
254a9(mdo): pa dang / chu pun gsum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byind cing / de'i kun dga' ra ba dka' dka' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas/ de na dga' ba'i rtsed po nyams
254b1(mdo): su myol bar byed do// gsum po nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ sA kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la gsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na/ 'di ltar sbyin gas te khyod la kun dag/
254b2(mdo): rab dgos na khyod kyi phyir// de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis yum po ni'i cheng du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun kun dka' ra ba kang du bcug nas de'i myor yum bi ni'i tshe la tshal
254b3(mdo): zhes bya bar gyur da to// rgyal po ser ge 'gram la yun ring po nas/ kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar 'gyur kyang ci ma nu snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas/ kye
254b4(mdo): ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur da kyang cim cung snyam pa'i khalas pa 'di yod do// ji tsam zhus gzhan zhig ma de btsum dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dka' bar byed/ dka' dkur spyod pa las dus gzhan/
254b5(mdo): zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyurd nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dku' 'das pa na thu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na stug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig
254b6(mdo): btsas so// btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang po/ legs par rab bcun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i kas rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes ste/ be tsom du gyur da nas
254b7(mdo): 'di bu mo yin nas/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul da pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo// de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i myo cir gdags zhes phyi'i 'dogs par byed do// blon
254b8(mdo): go rnams kyis smras pa/ sbas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bon tshogs lam mo che dang / mong dAs dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdonams su gle ban/ kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'dabu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gi las kyi rnam par sbyin pa
254b9(mdo): gzugs babang zhing kha dog phun gsum tshogs par gyur da to zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni/ 'di ni bu mo lags kyis 'o na ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so// zhes mtsho lags pas/
255a1(mdo): des pas na bu mo myong sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i mying sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do// zhes bya nas chen mor gyurd to// zhes bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin du'o// de la mtshan
255a2(mdo): mkhan rnams kyis lung bstand pa/ mtshan phun gsum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// zhes bstand to// yang de che bar byed/ dga' dkur spyod par byed pa las
255a3(mdo): bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na stug pa/ mdzes pa kha dog bzang mo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta bu bzhin du de'i
255a4(mdo): gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par myi nus so// de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i myi cing kad kas zhes mying 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa
255a5(mdo): sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas sgyu 'phrul chen mo/ zhes bgyi bar ka dgas so// zhes gdags so// de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams
255a6(mdo): kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsal bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal pora'agyur ro// zhes paston to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis
255a7(mdo): rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni/ sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun gsum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bu zhig btsal bar
255a8(mdo): 'gyur zhing / de ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan pa'i khu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i
255a9(mdo): rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzho nu zas katsang gi chung mar snoms shig seng ge/ 'akram gis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang ka zho nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis la/
255b1(mdo): gzhag par gyi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i gcan sum brgyam gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa de re shig 'dod do// gcig shos kyang tshogs lan
255b2(mdo): brtag par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang dkri'o// de'i tshe shag kya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bser zhes bya ba ri khrod pa gcig yod nas/ shag kya rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gi drung du song nas/ lha skya bser ri khrod pa
255b3(mdo): bdag cag la gnod pa bgyis kyis/ grogs mdzad du gsol// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo gas pas de rnams dang / lhan cig ka yul sprad par myi nus so// lha gzho nu zas gtsang btang du gsol/ dam zhig bca'
255b4(mdo): ste/ gal te gzhon nu 'i lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa cig bslangs pa'i ngasab de sbyin pa lda na btang po de rnams kyis spras pa/ lha bka' bzhin la la gsal par 'gyi'o// rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/
255b5(mdo): gzho nu zas gtsang la sngo nas des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste/ rmeg mye DA btang ngo // de nas shaka kya rnams maku nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gi drung du dong ste/ lha gzho nus ri khrod pa rnaMs/
255b6(mdo): bcom rab tu bcom ste/ migs myed par btang lags pas bdag cag blo ba dka' na/ gzho nu mchog ji bzhed gsungs shika dbul lo// shes ldan dag shag kya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa/ sus kyang mnya
255b7(mdo): pa las chung ma bzhag par myi bya'o zhes bcas so// lha ci khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam ki/ dral bar myi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu dam pa gcig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no//
255b8(mdo): lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos cho gas brtags zi nad kyis bu mo gcig kyang bkri shig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste/ gzhon nu zas
255b9(mdo): gtsang gis gnyi sa blangs so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhin rgyal po bas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor da pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang /
256a1(mdo): skye bo dang phyi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang / zab mo dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom kun myed cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyurd pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang la he pun gsum
256a2(mdo): tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la stug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang / lhan cig steng gi zhang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa myed par dong nas/ rol mo nye bar byed/ dka' bar
256a3(mdo): byed/ dka' mgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yin no// byang chub sems dpa' dka' ldan gi gnas na bzhugs pa na/ 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul
256a4(mdo): la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud myed la gzigs pa ste/ rgya cher mdo snga ma dang sbyar ro// mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs s+ho//
256a5(mdo): lo tsa ba dge slong rin ce na bzang pos sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
256a6(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ an+ya dri sha na ka ma na ma g.yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
256a7(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dka' ra ba na/ dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
256a8(mdo): chen po dang / zabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug pa dang / sems kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes so// stond pa ni bdag gis mngon gsum
256a9(mdo): du gyur da na/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rje'i spyan sngar bdag song la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gapal la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i ga ba zag de'i bsod nas
256b1(mdo): nyid cag sogs par 'gyur ba'i dad de chu bar rgya bam tu mamam pa// denas med nga ldan pag yo sa kyi zed kyi nas kyis/ nang du yang dag 'dogs sa sa te/ ma ldan 'dapags pa de mo ste phyin nas/
256b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gcig pu dben par mchis
256b3(mdo): na' du yang dag 'jog la mchis pan/ sems kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di sa sa sgye te/ rigs kyi chu nam rigs nu mi dad pa dang ldan pa gangs su sangs rgyas da cos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skabs su mchis/
256b4(mdo): ba'i gang bag de'i bsod nams kyi nyid cig stsogs par 'gyur las dpanam mo// de skad ces gamom pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyasame dang ldan pa ga ri'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsa yor to// gam
256b5(mdo): bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / rje karten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang / lha dang rtsi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhus pa legs
256b6(mdo): so legs so// kang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'ongs te/ don 'di yongs su zhu bar bsam pa de ni sha ri'i bu don 'di nyid rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir de dpes bstan par bya ste/ skyes
256b7(mdo): bu gang zag zhig rdzu 'phrul gi mthul 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur da pas gang 'di 'dzam bu'i gling dang / nye ba'i gling zheng dang srid du dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling de na kang srog chags gnas pa de dag
256b8(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams gzhan du bkod do// lag mthil ltar mnyam par byas par rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tika dmar po dang / de'i snying po dang /
256b9(mdo): spuka rnams las 'dzam bu'i gling tsam gyi mchod rten srid du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten ki ba la thug par brtsigs te/ mchod rten de la lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog dang / lha'i 'phreng ba dang / lha'i gdugs dang /
257a1(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyi mchod pa byas la/ de nas skyes bu de rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas/ ka rgya mtsho chen po'i gzhi'i chu dag 'jig rten gi khams gzhan du byo ste/ ma ru
257a2(mdo): ka'i til mar gyis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ltar bkang ba'i nang du snying po ri rab tsam btsugs la/ skal ba mang po'i mtha' ji srid par mar me'i rgyun myi 'chad par nus na/ sha ri'i bu ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de kazhi de las
257a3(mdo): bsod nams mang du stsogs snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// nyan thos dang rab sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
257a4(mdo): 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i yul lo// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo// bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs
257a5(mdo): byas dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des/ rgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ste/ stong dang brgya stong gi cha dang /
257a6(mdo): grangs dang rgyu dang / bgrang bar yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// de nas chos kyi nam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun
257a7(mdo): tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeka/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// der de'i tshe klog gi rgyun chen po byung ngo // lha rnams kyis kyang rnga sgra bsgrags so// de nas bcoM
257a8(mdo): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag
257a9(mdo): bo khyod kyis 'di ltar chos kyi nam grangs 'di zho mtha' yas pa sgrub pa ces bya bar zung shig/ de'i don ni de ltar lta bar bya ste/ de de bzhin du zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas na/
257b1(mdo): med ngaldan pa na pa'i bu dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa gsum la sbyams su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/
257b2(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gi mkhan po sa rbad gnya' de ba dang / zhu chen gi los pa ban de dpal tshigs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
257b3(mdo): A// rgya gar skad du/ nan da pra pra dz+ya su tra// bod skad du/ dga' po rab tu byung ba'i mdo'// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gyis zos pa dus gcig na
257b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gi s+ye gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang / sham thabs pan bas te/ srung zed bsdams nas/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong/
257b5(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms/ la gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga'/ bo'i khyim ka la ba der gshegs pa dang // rigs kyi bu dka'
257b6(mdo): bos/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
257b7(mdo): tshur gshegs// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa sa bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
257b8(mdo): gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi bu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dka' bo ci'i phyir rab tu kyi 'byung // dga' bos gsol pa/
257b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin no// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu seld pa yin no//
258a1(mdo): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / spu dang / ka yo'i mun pas bsdus pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no// lo tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta bur yon tan thams cad kyi/
258a2(mdo): gzhi yin no// rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin gi nor bu yin no// yon tan thams cad gi ko 'phang gi gnas yin no// sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no// 'byung
258a3(mdo): po thams cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no// srog chags thams cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin no// sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa yin no// skyabs myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no// kun tu tshol bas
258a4(mdo): 'phongs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyams zaka pa rnams kyi sti nga sa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no// sem sa can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba yin no// mkhas pa rnams kyis
258a5(mdo): bsngags pa yin no// thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no// sems can dag pa rnams kyi bsnyen par bya ba yin no// snod du gyurd pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin no// ngan song gi sgo gcod
258a6(mdo): pa yin no// mtho ris dang tha rud pa'i sgo 'byed pa yin no// lha'i la gro ba rnams kun tu 'gengs pa yin no// sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu gcod pa yin no// sred pa'i bcing pas bcings pa rnams
258a7(mdo): rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te// dka' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin no// tha rad pa'i yang dag pa'i sdom pa yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa la bsnyen pa yin no// rgyun nye bar gcod
258a8(mdo): pa yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams bsreg pa yin no// phra rgyas rnams 'byind pa yin no// lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no// bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba yin no// bzod pa smra ba sgreng ba yin no//
258a9(mdo): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par byed pa yin no// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa yin no// nu zho'i rgya mtsho skyems pa yin no// rus pa'i ri 'jig par byed pa yin no// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin
258b1(mdo): no// phung po'i khur 'jog pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin pa yin no// khyim gi gzeb du bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no// gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad par byed pa yin no//
258b2(mdo): be tsom rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyurd pa rnams gcod pa yin no// rga shis 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byind pa yin no// sdug pa dang bral ba zad par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses
258b3(mdo): pa rnams kyi bde ba dang myi 'jigs pa'i 'gram yin no// 'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par rgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs myed pa'i khams las rnam par rgal
258b4(mdo): bar byed pa yin no// don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob par byed pa yin te// dka' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi myig lta bu yin no// gti mug gi mun pa'i
258b5(mdo): sgron ma yin no// rgyud dag par byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// lam stor pa rnams la/ lam kun tu bstond pa yin no// chos thams
258b6(mdo): cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no// btud pa thams cad rnam par 'grol bar byed pa yin no// ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel pa yin no// myi shes pa'i rab rib kyi bsgrib pa'i mun pa rnams
258b7(mdo): 'dral bar byed pa yin no// le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la brtsom par byed pa yin no// tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyong bar byed pa yin no// tshul khrims yun gsum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed/
258b8(mdo): pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dka' ba yin no// nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dka' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no// rnal 'byor da spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par/
258b9(mdo): byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon cha yin no// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no// gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnas yin no// skyob pa myed
259a1(mdo): pa rnams kyi skyob pa yin no// 'jigs pas 'breld pa rnams kyi myi 'jigs par byed pa yin no// skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no// sdug bsngal rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad yin no//
259a2(mdo): 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa rnams 'akrol bar byed pa yin te// dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// lha dang myi rnams kyis bkur sti byas pa yin no/ myi'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams
259a3(mdo): cad kyi dgongs pa yin no// khyim gi kanas yongs su gtong ba yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yin no// skra'i zhur 'dreg pa yin no// kos dur smrig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no// rigs
259a4(mdo): pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no// 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no// bdud sdig to can rnams kyi dregs pa 'joms pa yin no// lha dang myi rnams rab tu dka' bar byed pa yin te// dka' bo rab
259a5(mdo): tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na/ ci'i phyir rab tu myi 'byung // dga' borab tu byung ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bde ba bas kyang ches khyad du 'phags par bde ba yin na// dga' bo gzhan yang dal ba tshogs
259a6(mdo): pa ni bskald pa bye ba brgya yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed pa dka' ba yin no// dga' bo tha rad pa 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang // gzhan
259a7(mdo): yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po sna bdun dang ldan pa rnams kyang // btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo // de bzhin du khyim bdag dang / bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams bor
259a8(mdo): nam rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa ladag ni khyim par mchis la/ sbyin pa dag yuld/ bsod nams dag bgyi zhing / bcom ldan
259a9(mdo): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur zhing / chos kos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun ki gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
259b1(mdo): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin ka shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa kang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten kang bar 'gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mo dad pa/
259b2(mdo): can la las lo brgyar 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ dag po de ni byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i sems kyi bcu
259b3(mdo): chug gi char yang myi phod do// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung// dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dka' bo stond pa mngon gyur pa// pal myi mnyes ma byed cig// dga' bo dper na/ sa chen po 'di chu gcig bur skya mtshos
259b4(mdo): gyur de la de na rus/ zhar ba cig kyang yod// de na ka nya' shing ki bu ngaka gcig pa gcig kyang sbrul/ ru sbal zhar ba de 'di skad du/ kanya' shing ki bu ka der mgrin pa gcig par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing /
259b5(mdo): kanya' shing bu ka can de yang rlung gis bskyod nas/ phyogs khyogs su rgyug par byed pa na/ dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig kis ru sbal/ zha rad pa de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing kau bu ka der 'jug par 'gyur ro/
259b6(mdo): dpa' bo nyid thob pa ni ma yin no// dal ba bun gsum tshogs pa de bzhin no// dka' bo khyod kyis myi nyid shin du rnyed par dka' ba dang // de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed na/
259b7(mdo): dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shin tu rnyed ka rnyed// dka' bo stond pa mngon gyur pa// pal myi mnyes ma byed cig/ dper na 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi dmyig gnam du bstan te// nyungs kar ki 'bru
259b8(mdo): nams 'thor bar byed// dga' bo brgyal rkyen zhig der nyungs kar gyi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur ki// dga' bo myi nyid rnyed pa ni ma yin no// dal ba phun gsum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no// dka' bo myi
259b9(mdo): nyid shin tu rnyed par dga' ba dang // de bzhin du dal ba phun gsum tshogs pa yang rnyed na// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shin tu rnyed ka rnyed// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// ral myi mnyes ma byed cig
260a1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni// brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang // sangs rgyas sgra ni myi zos na// sangs rgyas mthong ba ka la zhig/ u dum ba ra'i me tog ni// shing las shi nad tu rnyed ka ltar//
260a2(mdo): za/ de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed ka ste// khyed kyis ra ni rnyed 'gyur na// dka' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shi nad tu nyed dka' ste// dka' bo stond pa mngon gyur pa// ngal myi mnyes ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu dka' bo la
260a3(mdo): spu bregs te// kos ngur smrig bgos te// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / rigs
260a4(mdo): kyi bu dga' bo dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / dka' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo'// rdzogs sto//
260a5(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ sba bi ro ba ni man/ tra na// bod skad du/ ka nas brtan spyan drang ba// thams cadamakhyend pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa rnams dgongs su
260a6(mdo): gsol// dkongs nas kyang / shel dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / ku mu ta da dang / kha ba'i phung po dang / zla ba'i 'od gzer dang / ston ki chu dang / nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa lag ltar dri ma myed par mdzod la/
260a7(mdo): rlung ki stabs kyis shing ki lcug phran bskyod pa dang / spyig N+ya dang / sgyu ma dang / rmyi lam dang / kloka dang / rta'i shing rta'i rdul dang / bal glang gi phru gu'i na mchog dang / sbrulo ka lce dang / zil pa dang / rgya mtsho bskyod pa'i
260a8(mdo): rlabs ltar g.yo ba'i yid/ skad cika re raM la yang myi sdod par 'gro ba/ rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin ki stobs kyis yud tsam zhig rgyu ba nang du dkag tu gsol// smras pa/ ri ka zar 'bab pa'i dpa' rlabs gyurd pas kyang //
260a9(mdo): gang gi dpa' rlabs 'gyur la bskrun myed par// 'jig pa thogs myed g.yo ba'i yid de ni// yud tsam che gcig mdzod cig btsun pa rnams// lha'i bu mo yi chad shugs byung skad cig zi mying byas pa'i myika// ring zhing gzir
260b1(mdo): ldan bkra la 'od 'tsher myig chags lta ba g.yol ba yis// gang gi thugs ni skye ba rgyan gcod rgyalas 'khrugs par ma gyur da pa// bdud kyang 'joms mkhas gcig pu thams cad mkhyend pa de la phyag mdzod cig/ skye
260b2(mdo): ldan kang du brten nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can dmyal bzhi dang // yi dgas 'jig rten gnas su 'gro bar myi 'gyur sdug bsngal 'jig byed pa// 'khor ba dag na 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs gyur 'phags gcig
260b3(mdo): po// zhi bde krong khyer sgor gzhol de la shi nad tu gus pas bsten par mdzod// zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhig bde gshegs gsungs rab mthar phyin 'byung smra zhing / gar la gus par chung zad tsam zhig byin yang sbyin pa 'phel
260b4(mdo): gyur da ya// ye shes snang bas mun pa zad byas dge slong dge 'dun de la ni// nyon mongs gcad pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang gus par phyag mdzod cig/ lcang lo chun po'i sgra mar mgo la thogs shing dpung mgo gnyis
260b5(mdo): g.yog la// rang gi 'od gzer phyogs mthar 'phro ba rnams kyi sa 'jig rten kun 'gengs pa// lha dbang brgya byin cod pan btud/ de tshangs la phyag byas kar yin te/ phyi nad nas dka' byas sems
260b6(mdo): kyi ting 'dzin da shind tu chen po'i 'bras bu yin// rdo rje 'od 'a zo 'phreng bas dpung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur cing // lha la bka' stsol dbang po mtho ris sbyor ba gang yin pa/ de dag dge ba dag 'brug
260b7(mdo): dam sbyin 'gyur dus nyams dka' zhing / mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun gsum tshogs pa'i rgya rnams yin// kha nas rgyags 'gyur dri zhim 'byung zhing myig gi mtha' dpa' la// dbugs 'byung de shal g.yos
260b8(mdo): pas nu ma 'bum la 'drud byed pa/ sdug dgu' lhan cig nor bdag 'ga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin pa/ de yang 'gro ba nyams dga' sbyin pa'i nyid chen po yin// 'brug sgra sgrog cing sprin rnams tsu ni kun tu len byed pa/
260b9(mdo): rlabs 'byung dus na nor bu byi ru dung dang nya phyis 'byung // rin cen gnas ni chu lha nyid kyi 'byor da pas gang srung ba// der yang rgyu ni sbyin pas mchog cing thub pas bka' stsal to// gang yang 'od gzer nams kyis
261a1(mdo): mkha' la skamasa'i 'tshams kyis mnan cing // sa su ta'i ming yangs rnams su dpal ni rab tu nam skye nas// glang po 'i mche ba'i dpal dang ldan zhing sa can po gan tu mjam pa// de ya
261a2(mdo): par sbyin pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ro bro mang po yin// mi rab mal shing rtas lam la 'dug pa'i rin cen rdo gcog cing // rta'i rka lag rnams kyis dku tshigs chu bo rlabs ni gcod byed la/ mun pa bsal phyir nyi mas skar ma/
261a3(mdo): zil mnan lam me kar yin pa// de rgyu yid kyis taMng nge 'dzi nad kyis bskyed pa'i sbyin par thub par gsungs// rgyal mtshan cher btags rin cen 'od gzer snang bas nam ka dmar gyurd cing // ta rmya ka 'dor bas
261a4(mdo): mkha' la sprin ki 'phreng ba dag kyang 'brel byed la// rnga yab dkar pos g.yabs shing 'khor los sgyur ba song ba kang yin pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs shes thub pas bka' stsal to//
261a5(mdo): kaser ki pad ma'i rdul ki phye mas dpar bris mtshon ni zhus byas te// de'i nags 'dab bu ba skra 'byin rnams su nyal ba/ 'i bde rnyed nas// rigs 'dzinang chung ma lta cig 'jigs myed/
261a6(mdo): mkha' las 'gro ba kang yin pa// de yang 'jil zhing skyon myed dka' ba'i sbyin pa'i gzi brjid yon// ma la ya'i lo ma tsan dang grib mas bsil bas yangs pa dang // 'bi kres byed ra dang
261a7(mdo): kangs dang lhun po'i ri dang man da ri'i ri bo la// grub pa'i tshogs chen chung ma lhan cig 'jigs la dka' ba gang yin pa/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di'i snying po 'byor da pa de yang gtong ba yin// bud myed rkang gtub 'khrul
261a8(mdo): bas 'drogs nas 'phyar ba'i phug ron gnas pa'i// khang pa mthon po rnams 'byigs byed r-i rtse 'gron khrin klang dang // gdugs dang rnga yab bud myed g.yog 'khor rin cen gser dang rta rnams dang // bzang mdzes
261a9(mdo): de dag kun kyang sngon gi sbyin po'i dge ba'i nam sbyin yin// ban du ka ltar rtsa dmar dkun cang ka ser snod bzang por legs blugs pa// yongs dka a mri sbyin ltar dri zhim ud dpal 'bying zhing ldem// na chung bzhin pa
261b1(mdo): mna' sgrog dus kyis stobs shing yams grangs mang 'drim pa// mchog tu dge' ba de rgyu sbyin pa yin zhes blo gros dag pas gsungs// kaser ki phag skas rked bcings snyan smra 'dzum zhing sbyin ma ya cig spyod// myig yangs
261b2(mdo): nag zug dkar kanag 'byes la sgra bkab me tog 'phreng dkrigs pa'i// na chung bzang mo brla rgyas bdag nyid legs byas rnams kyi bran ltar byed// tshogs bsugs 'bras de smyon pa'i che bo nyid ces zas gtsang sras po
261b3(mdo): gsungs/ de lta lags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mtha' dag thugs su chud pa// shi nad tu rgyas pa'i chu ltar gyur da ba// snying dri ma myed pa dang // lho'i skye bo dang klu'i gnas su gyur da pa/ tshul khrim
261b4(mdo): 'dren ma ma yin zhing rgya che ba'i chu dang ldan pa dge ba la rnam par rtog pa'i zla ba shar ba'i dbang gyis/ ting nge 'dzind sna tshogs rgyas pa'i dus kyi rlabs kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag skyon myed pa'i
261b5(mdo): nor bu mang po kun tu g.yengs pa/ sems kyi 'og bzhi la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo chen po brten pa/ 'bras bu'i bye brag thob pa/ gang zag chen po'i chu srin rgyub/
261b6(mdo): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ dran pa nye bar gnaka pa'i ngogs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa'i ro myi gnas pa/ sbyangs pa'i/
261b7(mdo): yon tan goms pa dag po'i mu tig gi nyo phyis kyi khog lus dang ldan pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gting myi dpogs shing zab pa/ rgyun myi 'chad par klog pa dang / kha don byed pa'i sgra rgya cher 'byung ba/ 'phags
261b8(mdo): pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gi rgya mtsho chen po la bdag gsol ba 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste srid pa'i 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa du ma nas dge ba'i sa bon btab pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa/ gzhal
261b9(mdo): byed khang gi sa bzhi gcig par gyur da pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa dang byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang zos pa dang zhi ba'i gnas/ bdag dang gzhan gi gzhung gi don gi de kho na ma lus par rtogs pa/ yongs su
262a1(mdo): shes pas bsgoms pas/ dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong bas log par lta ba'i rab ba bstsal pa// legs par brjod cing shis la rgya che ba'i mying dang ldan pa skye bo bla ma/
262a2(mdo): la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mngon tu smras pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba las stsogs pa'i tshul bzang po dang ldan zhing mdod gsol che bas snyan pa rnams bskyed pa/ ston ki zla ba nya ba'i 'od gzer dag pa lta bu'i yid 'byung ba/
262a3(mdo): sbyin bdag chen po che ba'i bdag nyid can myong 'd-i zhes bya ba 'do ni khyim bdag legs sbyin dang / bzang ldan dang / btsun mo 'khor kau pra dang / mu shil dang / tra pu sa dang / ko shi la dang / sta pa kar ni ka dang / mgon myed zas sbyin
262a4(mdo): dang / drag po dang / nag pa dang / nam gru las stsogs pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la yid mngon par dad pa/ kasas rgyal dang / tshangs pas sbyin dang / rgyal po sha rad pa'i bu dang / gtum po rab snang las stsogs
262a5(mdo): pa sa'i steng la dbang ba'i sbyin pa las 'byung ba'i legs pa spyod pa'i/ rjes su slob ste/ lus dang longs spyod dang srog la/ sgyu ma dang sbyig/ rgyu dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mgal me bskor ba ba dang / rgya lam
262a6(mdo): dang / ri'i 'bab chu'i chu ltar g.yo bar rig nas/ stobs bcu mnga' ba gsungs pas tshigs su bcad pa dang chos mngon pa dang / 'dul ba da / mdo sde 'dzin cing / dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sbyin
262a7(mdo): pa yod do zhes/ bsod nams kyi sa bon skyed pa'i rgyu 'khor ba/ phun gsum tshogs pa'i bzhi/ skye bo ngan pas rnyed par dka' ba/ ser sna can gyi yid 'jom pa sgrub pa na/ ston ki zla ba dri ma myed pa ltar dang ba'i thugs mang
262a8(mdo): pa/ srid pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyend pa/ grags pa 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa/ bdud kyi bu mo steg pa rgyun gcod pa'i rgyu// skyabs su 'os pa chos stond pa
262a9(mdo): 'gro ba la dge ba'i bya dka' ba'i 'phrin las rnams kyis/ chos thams cad thugs su chud pas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od gzer gi snang ba gsal bas reka nas pad po'i 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar ring zhing byas
262b1(mdo): rdzi ma legs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ gnod sbyin gi bdag po'i gtsug ki nor bu chen pos zhabs kyi sor mo kund tu bskor pa/ ka ser ki mchod sdong ltar gsal ba/ sku la rdo rje dang lcag kyu dang / pad ma dang nya dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
262b2(mdo): gdugs dang / 'khor lo las stsogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyi mtshan mnga' ba/ pad ma'i 'byung gnas rnams la/ snar mdzad kyi 'od kyi 'phreng ba bye brag myed par khyab par rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phung po'i tshogs ltar sngo ba'i gtsug tor/
262b3(mdo): ki nang nas kun tu 'byung ba'i 'od kyi dra bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus par bkra bar byas pa/ kha na ma zo myed par zhugs pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa stond pa/ zhi bar gzhol ba'i lam du 'dren pa/ 'jig rten sgrol ba mnye
262b4(mdo): gshin pa/ gnyen gcig pu/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i sgrol ba nams kyis gsu dang thugs dang dpa' ba dang / mthul kyai gnod pa katsama'i sras// yul rnams kun la med pa 'byung ba rgyun skams byed/
262b5(mdo): pa'i rgyu// skye bo mkhas pa rnams ni sad par bya phyir shar gyur da pa/ bka la nyal kau rab rib sel ba ye shes snang ba'i mchog/ sa nas mtha' dag snang ba phyogs rnams thams cad snang mdzad pa/
262b6(mdo): phyag dang zhabs dang dashu ni rab tu byin zhing tshul khrims dang / smon lam dag gis byang chub lam bzang yang dag bsgrubs gyurd pa/ srid pa'i 'gro ba'i dug kyis snye ma'i steng du ltung ba'i// skye dgu
262b7(mdo): nams la kha na ma yo myed pa ston mdzad pa/ zid pa rnam pa gsum 'jig pa// bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi mnga' ba/ dpa' ba dang mthu kha na ma tho ba myed pa/ mtshan dang
262b8(mdo): dpe byad bzang po sa brgyan pas sku brjid pa// pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bka' ba brgya phrag du mas dam pa'i chos dkon mchog bsgrubs pa/ bstsal pa tsam kis sems can mtha' dag gi bsam pa zhugs su
262b9(mdo): chud pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rab tu zhi ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ nyon
263a1(mdo): mongs pa'i rab rib dang / ling tog ma lus par bstsal pa/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rig pa dang / phyogs phyogs kyi gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / r-i dang nags 'dab dang / wad khrod dang /
263a2(mdo): chu dang ri sul dang / gshems dang / ne'u sing dang / shing ki krib ma nam pa sna tshogs la dgyes pa/ yul dang ljongs tu ma la phan gdags par tshol ba mdzad pa/ yang dag po'i dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / dga' ba
263a3(mdo): thob pa las ma nyams pa/ phung po lnga spyir skad gcig par yang dag par so sor rtog pa'i yid la byed pa skyed pa/ mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / gleng gzhi dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / rtogs
263a4(mdo): pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / gtan la phab pa'i gtam kyis sems sbyangs pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'jug pa dra na pa nye bar gnas par rgyu ba/ dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi
263a5(mdo): yan laka dang bden pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang dz+dzi dran pa nye/ gzhag pa bsgom pa goms pas dad pa thob/ bu mo phrugs kyis nyams dga' la// ri sul mthon po dpag bsams nags mang
263a6(mdo): dang // ri bka' rnams na kang dag bzhugs pa dang / shing gi me tog 'brul bas tri zhim byas pa yi ser bu rad ldan zhing // nags na glang po 'dreg pa zag pas bsgoms pa'i rin cen 'khri shing khyim/
263a7(mdo): khyim la chags pa myed pa'i lha yis bsten pa'i bsod nams chu gling gi// gnya' shing 'dzin khri bya t+yags zhu gnas pa na gang dag bzhugs pa dang // bal mos bsnyogs sdod pa'i thub 'gyur tshal// me tog ldan zhing ser bu rang
263a8(mdo): ldan pa/ sa h+ya ri bo ngos ni yangs pa la// yongs dag shugs mnga' thub pa bzhugs dku dang // pad ma ud pa la rgyas pa 'byung ba'i gnas// nyin re nyi ma'i shing rtas rdo snad can// srid pa'i 'jigs bral rab tu
263a9(mdo): yid 'ong ba// 'char ba'i steng kang dag bzhugs pa dang // ri'i rtse mos sngo sangs sprin thal sman lcong can// ngogs ldan chu bo man da ras ni ri sul bkrus// glang po'i mche bas bsnyogs pas sa phyogs klogs pa'i //
263b1(mdo): 'byigs byed rma bya rgyags gnas pa na bzhugs dgu dang // sna tshogs 'byung kun tshon gyi kha bsgyur puka dang ldan zhing sprin kyang chags gyur pa la// ko lpags ldan pa gtsang ma'i chu yis ngogs kyi rdo ba mang po bkrus gyur da cing //
263b2(mdo): gosol pa yang mjug ma mang po 'byang zhing klog 'grus snang byas pa// yongs 'dus ri rtse phrag na gcig pu sred dang bral ba kang dag bzhugs pa dang // gang dag shing dang khri rnam pa mang po 'dab chags par gnas pa/ ne'u sing
263b3(mdo): 'jam la sngo ba'i steng na/ ma bya'i lcags byed cing / sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ mi dgas kyi tshogs pag yangs su gnas pa'i chom bcas pa ma kha'i chu gu yod pa me tog gi dr-i zhem pos bskos pa'i ser bu 'jam zhing bsal
263b4(mdo): ba'i rad ldang ba'i nags 'dab rnams su gnas bcas te bzhugs pa rnams dang / yang gang dag dus su rlabs 'byung po'i chu'i dpa' rlab sa kyis g.yengs pa'i na le zham dang / yi shi dpal ba la'i 'bras bu
263b5(mdo): sngon po mang po 'grigs pa'i tshan dang a ka ru'i shing khrod na gnas/ pa'i sprul mgo'i gdengs kha gdengs shing 'jigs su rung ba yod pa/ glang po dregs dang bcas pa'i snas byu ru'i sdong bu skyel pa
263b6(mdo): dang ldan zhing / nyi ma'i 'od gzer gis reg pa'i dbang kyis bu tin yod pa'i nyaphyis 'bye ba'i log pas rnam par smras pa nye bar 'u la ba dang ldan la/ no zhu mchog gi rdol grub pa'i chung ma'i skyen
263b7(mdo): gnas shing bya'i khru dga' ste sgra 'byin pas klu len pa lta bu yod pa'i rgya mtsho klong dag na/ klu'i bdag po'i lus chen pos sku dkris te/ gdengs ka'i gtugs kyis nyi ma'i 'od gzer bsgribs shing bsam gtan mdzad pa rnam
263b8(mdo): dang NaM sman srong dag na phyogs kyi glang chen brang kyis rdo ba khyebs pa'i khyu 'khod cing // khyor bcas lhan cig ma yin ra ro ba'i gnod sbyin mo dag gnas gyur pa la// klu'i rgyal po mgo bo bsdod de kha nas 'od 'bar byung bas shing the
263b9(mdo): cing // gangs ri ti se la ni blo gtsang gang dag zhal ton mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang // rgya mtsho rlabs kyis bshald pa'i ra bkab ldan pa ma smad pa// ri bo man da mal nyin phyed tshun chad bzhugs bzhugs shing // nyi ma phye bar/
264a1(mdo): ga/ murang nas gang dag bzhan du 'khrugs pa'i phyir// nor bus rtse mo bkras pa khor yug ril stend pa dang // gang dag 'bri shing gzhon nus rdo ba khyebs gyu rang ba'i// dbang chen rtse mo nyid du 'ong bar bder gnas te/
264a2(mdo): mkha' lding shugs kyis nang du klu rnams dkrugs pa ya~M// rgya mtsho rin cen gnas la rnam par gzigs pa dang // ngang pa'i tshogs can shin tu gtsang ba drag 'bab char gi chu yis mi bkab bkrus gyurd cing // phyogs kyi glang pos/
264a3(mdo): bkyel da po'i sa la ki yis rdo ba chen po mang po khyebs gyur da la// gcan zan dbang po ral pa 'khyil cing gsal bas dpung po'i phyogs 'bar nyal bas dgar gyurd cing // sbal myig 'thon pa'i lcug mas 'khor da pa grub pa/
264a4(mdo): ngal sos ri bo kron dzar kang gshegs dang // kang dag mun brtsal khyad par can gi blo mnga' shing ljon sna tshogs me tog rgyas gyurd cing / ri dgas rgyu bas ne'u ka sing gzhon smad pa// ka Ti rno nags rnams
264a5(mdo): myi spong bzhugs pa dang // yang kang dag chub kyi ban lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang kai sgra myi snyan dang / gling gzhan dag na skyes pa'i lcug phran mdog snum zhing sngo la 'jam pa mang pos
264a6(mdo): sa gzhi kun tu khyebs pa/ shing gi grob ma'i dkyil 'khor po sil ba dang / khri shing gis 'khor cing / mi dgas mang po gnas pa'i nags tshal de dang de dag na bzhugs pa rnams dang / yang kang dag da ra da dang kas
264a7(mdo): dam dang su can mi dang / ga rid dang / bag sa dang / mig dang / yul dang / n+ya yul dang / gor khye bas 'dra dang / rdo 'jog pas 'dra dang / skyes pa'i grong rkye dang / phyogs mtshas dang / kun nyim la pa dang
264a8(mdo): byed dang / grong byer dang / shuka dang / bat+ta dang / gcu ga pa dang / gzugs kyi dang / ser sna'i gnas dang / mnyan med dang / kyi grub pa dang / grong me tog dang ti dang / 'acos rbag dang / zob kyir longs spyod dang /
264a9(mdo): bka dang rgyam po'i ma dang / dbang po'i thag zug dang / 'brog dang / gos grong dang / ku dag 'grong dang / mnod rted gi grong dang / 'bru khrag mi grong dang / nam par rgyal ba 'grong dang / yangs pa dang lo ma mags so/
264b1(mdo): ba dang / 'phel byed dang / zangs kyi sa g.yogs dang / sngo rnyogs 'dzind dang / ko sa la dang / an dra dang / a ling ka dang / bar ba ra dang / nas gling dang / sing pa la'i gling dang / ka la sha'i grong khyer dang / kaser ka~M sa dang /
264b2(mdo): da ri ka la dang / bo ro sha ka ta ha dang / na li ke ra dang / pa na sa'i gling dang / shur pa dang / nim pa'i grong khyer dang / dpal gi zhing dang / dngul chu'i gnas las stsogs pa/ yul dang / cha byad dang / skad dang / gnas pa dang /
264b3(mdo): mog dang / rigs dang / nus dang / tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims can du ma'i yul gyi gnas pa'i yul gzhan dag na/ bzhugs pa rnams dang / tsuM gang dag sngon chad nyi zla'i 'od kyis ma phog cing / shes sha sprul ki/
264b4(mdo): lus kyi 'obs gnas ri'i drung / de'i gtsug kau rin cen 'od gis mun bsal ba'i// sa 'og tu ni ring po ma thogs gshegs kyur dang // gang dag chu ltar sa la thogs myed bye'u bral mdzad pa dang /
264b5(mdo): gang dag sar gnas phyag gi rtse mos zla ba reka mdzad dang // ka pa/ dka bya ltar nam ka la ni shugs kyis rgyu mdzad cing // na bza'i tha mas sprin mthar reg pas/ sprin yid 'jig mdzad dang //
264b6(mdo): gang dag lnga dang / klu grub pa dang / 'khor gi tshogs rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa'i mi 'jigs myed dang / bung ba'i yi dang / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal dang / shar gyi ri'o dang nub kyi ri bo dang / sha
264b7(mdo): kun da pa ta dang / kun dpo ma dang / ta ma pa'i tshal dang / bsil tshal dang / lhas sprul dang / 'jigs myed ri dang / nags tshal chen po dang / tsher ma can gi nags tshal dang / byams pa'i mi dang / chu zim byis pa
264b8(mdo): gsod kyi ri dang / ri nag po dang / gnas kyi ri dang / ser skya'i ri dang / me tog gi r-i der / tsan dan ki ri dang / klu'i ri bo dang / tsan dan ri bo dang / tsher ma'i ri'o dang / lha yul babs dang / a pa sim b+ha dang / kun rka
264b9(mdo): stong ldan dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / gzhi bkrus dang / rang gis mchod rten dang / sa su spungs pa la tshe rabs gzhan dang gzhan na bstsags pa'i dge ba'i rnam par smin pas grub pa/ ji ltar 'byor da par nus pa/
265a1(mdo): dang mthun pa'i rtsom pas tshogs bstsags pa/ phan yon lnga'i rgyu sems can thams cad gnas par byed pa// 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba thob par byed pa/ kha dog dang dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang ldan

265a3(mdo): la thog mar bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i tshe/ gang dag ye shes kyi mes nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad ma lus par bsregs pa/ gtong ba'i ngang tshul can gi sbyin pa'i sa
265a4(mdo): bon 'phel ba'i rgyur gyurd pa phra ba gzigs pa mkhas pa de kho na la bsgom pa 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan pa ra dA dza bsod snyoms lend dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / sbyin byed dang / lam
265a5(mdo): bstan dang / skyed byed dang / gser be'u dang / rtogs byed dang / rdo rje can kau bu dang / 'phags pa srung ba'i klu dang / klu sde las so// kas pa slob ma bstand pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnod par
265a6(mdo): gyur kyang lus kyi khur khyer ba rnams dang / gzhan yang gang dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i skye bo la phan pa'i phyir/ gser gi rdo le chen po'i steng na 'dug pa'i rigs sngags 'chang du ma ku'u len
265a7(mdo): bas glang po che yur la thung ba'i mchu pad ma la 'jib cing 'khod pa'i man da ra ba'i rdzing gi chu dang ldan zhing yal ga gsal ba'i steng na rin po che'i me tog kau 'phreng ba bres pa'i shing yongs 'dus kyis kun tu mdzes par byas
265a8(mdo): pa'i ro'i lhun mo'i 'bab chu 'bab pa'i sa gzhi la 'khod pa rnams dang yang na gang dag/ gser ri khyed nas bsil ba'i chu 'bab la// tshul zla ba'i gzugs brnyan byung gyur da cing // zla ba'i 'od kyis ku lung 'bye ste/
265a9(mdo): ku zung tsam na phrad sran rang ba gnas/ gang po ma tse'u ma sgra gan ldan pa 'byed/ ma mo ngogs ma bya dgar bcas rgyags pa gnas// ma ma rgyags sma ma 'i sul san pa zag// mi su la yal gzugs pa ma tra~M/
265b1(mdo): rtse 'khrigs// ri rtse stong rnams na ni sprin chags la// lang ling sprin gyis sman ldong wa khro sdang // sman ldong skyes pa'i nor bu dum bu gsal// ldum bu las sbrul lhung ba'i me tog ldan// me tog rgyas pa'i dpags bsams
265b2(mdo): shing rtsal mdzes// mdzes pa'i lha mos gser gi phag skas drung // gser kau phag skas smras ni bya 'drogs shing // byas 'chos shing tog rtsa las chad cing sprul// rtsa 'phyang zhu ba zag pa spos kyi dri// spos glang dbang po 'dreg
265b3(mdo): zag dri rab zhim// dri rab zhim pa'i li shi ri 'khor yang // bal glang mo rgyags drag 'gro lang lor gyur// bung ba'i rgyus mes me tog gzigs gyuran cing // yal ga ye tog rgyas par gad pa dkar// gad pa chad pas ro
265b4(mdo): dum bu snad// me tog 'gro ldogs sprul pas rnam par bkra/ nor bu sil ma yang po sa'o zhol sbas// me tog zegs pa'i shing yal kar gnas pa'i bung ba dga' bas 'phur rnams dang // zla ma/

265b9(mdo): bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas 'jug pa dag pa'i dgra bcom pa rnams bzhugs bzhugs pa/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gso//
266a1(mdo): sman dang / yo byad dang / mchog chas rnams kyis legs par byas pa/ mtha' mtha' na na'i chu'i gnas yod pa la nye bar spyod pas nyams dga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis bcags pas
266a2(mdo): gtsang bar gyurd pa'i sa gzhi can zhi ba thub pa'i skye bo gnas pa rnams na de kho na bsgoms pas nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind bskyed pa/ tshe'i lhag ma gnas par mdzad pa rnams dang b+h+r-i/ gang dag glog 'gyu bya gang dag gis sku lus

266a4(mdo): ka nam du lta ba rnams la thugs rjes steng nas char kyi rgyun 'bebs dang // rin cen bye ma'i 'phreng ba gya gyur da dkrigs mtho la// dang khyu bka yangs gnas shing lang long nyal gyur da cing // chu dang nye bar chu'i
266a5(mdo): zer mas bsil gyur da pa// ma na sa'i mtsho gling bsam gtan ma dzad dgu dang // gang dag mye ro mang po sha dang khrag ki ro bro bas dga'// bar gyur da pa'i wa'i tshogs kyis gang bar gyu rad pa'i sa phyogs mgo'i

266a8(mdo): bzad pa'i kha nas/ du ba dang bcas pa'i phye lce 'byung ba'i dur khrod chen po dag na bud byed kyi ro lbos shing lto sgang der gyur pa'i steng na 'dug cing // dga' ba'i bya rgod kyi mchu dang sder mos lto phrad cing lto'i nang nas srin bu'i rigs na/

266b1(mdo): nas ni// khrag dang sa chags dmar zhing rtsub pa'i sgra 'khyil dang // bya'i mchu dang sder mos rmyig zho brus pa yang // mye ro bor ba'i lus la gzigs par gyurd pa dang // sgo dang srang bar la yar mye 'bar phye// lce'i rtse mo mang pos/

267b9(mdo): bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gang dag 'dir gnas pa/ 'dul ba'i cho ga la goms pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'jug pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang ma lus par ci bder do mod kyi mtshan mo zad par mdzod la/ 'dra

268a2(mdo): 'gro ba'i ma lta bu// / de dag rte par mdzod la sbyin pa dag phan par bzhed pas ngas 'dir spyon// phyag na rdo rje las stsogs sa la gnod sbyin gtso bo dang // mub pa rnams dang gang dag lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang /

268a8(mdo): 'brel // sen mo'i 'od kyis khyab brgyal po phyag gis bsgrub par sho ka/ sred pa'i 'dod chags nyon mongs zhags pa bsal cing sred myed la/ chu'i chu gter lta bur yon tan rnams kyi gnas gtsog po//

268b1(mdo): ri dgas rtags can 'od kyi ral pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan pa 'char ba dang // rgya mtsho rgyas par gnas pa de srid lha dang lha myin phyag byas pa'i// bde bar gshegs kyi bstand pa thogs pa myed la gnas par shog/
